We have our own production facilities in Poland, equipped with advanced technology and operated by a team of skilled engineers and technicians who ensure every product meets the highest standards of quality, safety, and performance.
This is why our product are high quality at competitive prices
NT Industry – since 2003
Modern & Innovative Machines for Production
At NT Group we specialize in transport equipment for the shipping industry, special transport equipment, roll trailers, agriculture trailers and general industrial products.
Our highly skilled engineers and sales department will guide you though the best solutions to handle your logistics.
Our Technological Advantages:
large painting cabin (6mx30m) – 2 chambers
shotblasting cabin (6 x 30)
3 CNC horizontal milling and boring machines
400 t, 12 m long bending machine
12 robot welding stations
15 overhead cranes
3t – 16t forklifts
plasma cutting
bending, rolling, welding (EU 3834-2)
We offer complex and complete services:
PLC programming
New product development
Maintenance and operator training
Commissioning
Production test
Spare parts support
Service repairs
Service upgrades
Complete refurbishmentsProject Title: “Establishment of a Research and Development Center for Energy Efficiency and Carbon Footprint Reduction”.
Project co-financed by the European Union.
Project Description: NT Industry sp. z o.o. is implementing a project co-financed by the European Union under the European Funds for Silesia 2021-2027 (EFRR), Measure FESL.01.02 – Research, Development, and Innovation in Enterprises.
The aim of the project is to build a modern Research and Development Center (R&D Center) that will support the development of technologies enhancing energy efficiency and reducing the carbon footprint in transportation equipment.
As part of the project, testing facilities and specialized equipment will be created to simulate machine operations under real conditions, enabling the development of innovative solutions, including recovery systems and hybrid power systems.
Project Tasks:Construction of R&D infrastructure,
Purchase and installation of specialized equipment,
Creation of testing stations for industrial technologies.Target Groups:Employees and engineers of NT Industry,
Industrial partners (including SMEs),
Research institutions,
Domestic and international clients of NT Industry.
Project Objectives:Increase NT Industry’s innovation capacity,
Development of green technologies,
Strengthening cooperation between science and industry,
Reduction of emissions and improvement of energy efficiency.Project Outcomes:Establishment of the Research and Development Center,
Implementation of new technologies,
Development of staff competencies,
Growth of regional innovation.
Total Project Value: 14,006,000.00 PLN
European Funds Contribution: 5,602,400.00 PLN
This project is implemented with the support of European Funds.
#FunduszeUE #FunduszeEuropejskie #NTIndustry #R&D #Innovation #GreenTransition #EnergyEfficiency
We ensure high quality products and engagement in meeting customer requirements by Quality Management System compliant with implemented ISO 9001:2015 standard Poland. Our welding shop is fully compliant with PN-EN ISO 3834-2 standard.

SERVICE & SUPPORT
THERE FOR YOU AT ALL TIMES
We help you find the right solution
We are available after delivery, so you are guaranteed a good start-up
We provide after-sales service.
Contact:
service@ntindustry.com
What we offer
Spare parts
Webshop
Team  & Contact
NT Service – since 2018
There for you when you need us
Our skilled and competent employees in service and support are never further away than a phone call or an email.
The NT Service Team also has the ability to arrange product training, service and spare parts programs with our clients. We offer a holistic approach based upon your specific situation, such as strategic purchasing, Kanban stock, fixed maintenance programs, customized training programs and more.
What we offer
Unique skills of NT Service people is allowing us to complete various, very often not standard tasks like:​ ​
PLC programming​
New product development​
Maintenance and operator training​
Commissioning​
Production test​
Spare parts support​
Service repairs​
Service upgrades​
Complete refurbishments​
On-site maintenance
NT Service is providing repairs and parts replacement. Our team is ready to support customer in any part of the world in shot notice with spare parts and labor. If needed we are able to deliver replacement unit to customer for repair period.
We are not limeted by travel restrictions as we are closely cooperating with local service Companies around the world. We have also developed AVATAR service tools to give remote access to all flexmaster and Translifter devices.
Spare parts
With NT Service Team we ensure that your Novatech and NT Liftec products have the lowest possible down time and longest product lifespan by only, providing original and high-quality spare parts at the right time and the right place.
With NT Service Team you will have full access to our comprehensive spare parts program, with 24/7 support and coverage all over the world. We also offer the highest level of engineering support on our products from our dedicated service engineers, with anything from remote assistance to direct on-site work.
Our warehouses of original spare parts and service engineers are placed strategically in the center of Europe at our main production facility at NT Industries, in order to be able to offer the quickest and most effective response time on any request.
The NT Service Team also has the ability to arrange product training, service and spare parts programs with our clients. Where we offer a holistic approach based upon your specific situation, such as strategic purchasing, Kanban stock, fixed maintenance programs, customized training programs and more.
For more information on what the NT Service Team can do for you, please contact our service department to learn what your possibilities are.

Name: CIMPAX A/S
Description:
CIMPAX A/S is a renowned Danish medical equipment manufacturer that specializes in the production of high-quality, Danish-designed disposable instruments used in laparoscopic surgery, pain treatment, electrosurgery, and surgical smoke evacuation.

Our dedicated efforts in product design, development, and manufacturing are centered around our commitment to delivering optimal patient care, fostering a conducive working environment for healthcare professionals, and upholding environmental sustainability principles.

coagulating tissue during surgical procedures.\nRead more\nPain Management\nPostoperative pain remains prevalent and is the greatest concern for a patient.\nRead more\nLaparoscopy\nLaparoscopy is a Name: Sax Lift A/S
Description:
Sax Lift, a leading provider of lift tables and mobile lift solutions in Europe. With a focus on high-quality products, safety, service, and fast delivery, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner for our customers.

With over 30 years of experience, Sax Lift has consistently met the needs of our clients across various industries. Our extensive stock of over 2,000 lift tables ensures that we can deliver orders quickly and efficiently. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to deliver solutions that meet our customers' specific requirements.

As we continue to grow and expand, we remain dedicated to maintaining the highest standards in everything we do. Whether you're looking for a standard lift table or a bespoke solution, we're here to provide reliable, efficient, lifting solutions for your business.

Name: Fremco A/S
Description:
Fremco A/S is an innovative fiber blowing machine manufacturer located in Frederikshavn, Denmark. We primarily develop, manufacture, and supply high quality equipment for blowing fiber cables into ducts.

In addition, we provide cable blowing machines that can handle the injection of multiple micro ducts in larger ducts.
Our product range also covers hydraulic power stations that are designed specifically for our fiber blowing machines. 

We are ISO 9001-certified 

All our products are developed in close cooperation with our users, focusing on usability and a stable, robust function.

Name: Staring
Description:
With more than 60 years experience in tools and machinery for the building industry, Staring is a valid and serious partner for you as an entrepreneur, builders merchants and the master craftsman. For many years Staring A/S was a member of the Stiholt Group Denmark. But in 2010 C.E.O. Tommy Bredal and Sales Director Michael Oestergaard took over the ownership of the company.

No matter if you are a craftsman, reseller or employee at Staring, the sole purpose of our existence is to make sure you get "a better workday".

Name: DI-Teknik A/S
Description:
DI-Teknik A/S is a strong Automation solution partner in the Danish market.

We offers Automation for almost all industries ect. food and beverage, petro chemical industries, Pharma industries, handling industries.

Some of our skills are, High voltage suply infrastructure, Electrical Service and maintenance, Thermo camera reports, Ultra sound service reports, cable finding tasks, Electrical engineering risk analysis, ATEX areas. Programming the most common PLC, SACDA and DCS systems.

We do projects and service in the Danish market every day.

We are Certified Solution partner at Siemens and Rockwell Automation.

Name: WASHPOWER A/S
Description:
Washpower A/S is a danish company which develops and sells high-performance cleaning machines for the industrial segment. 

The keywords are simple, robust and flexible technology that requires a minimum of maintenance and, at the same time, is able to streamline the customer’s work processes and enhance the customer’s day-to-day working environment.

Moreover, the machines are extremely service-friendly and support is easy to access.
WashPower works continuously on improving our products to meet the customer’s needs and we are always open to dialogue regarding customised solutions.

    "title": "Vaskerobotter til landbruget for effektiv rengøring i stalden",
    "bodyText": "ProdukterVaskerobotter\nKyllingehusvasker\nRengøring af tanke i industrien\nBlueComfort Fiskepumpe\nKartoffelkassevaskerOm osVi er Washpower\nJob\nNyheder\nPig Facts\nData- og cookiepolitikKontakt osForhandleroversigt\nMedarbejdereService\nBook DemoSvinestald\nKyllingehus\nFiskepumpe\nVælg en side\nProdukterVaskerobotter\nKyllingehusvasker\nRengøring af tanke i industrien\nBlueComfort Fiskepumpe\nKartoffelkassevaskerOm osVi er Washpower\nJob\nNyheder\nPig Facts\nData- og cookiepolitikKontakt osForhandleroversigt\nMedarbejdereService\nBook DemoSvinestald\nKyllingehus\nFiskepumpe\nVideoafspiller\nMedia error: Format(s) not supported or source(s) not foundDownload fil: https://washpower.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Washpower-x100-washing-robot-loop10.webm00:0000:0000:00Brug op/ned piletasterne for at skrue op eller ned for lyden.\nVaskeløsninger\ntil landbrug og industri\nWashpower udvikler og producerer driftssikre og fleksible kvalitetsprodukter til professionel rengøring\nBook en demo\nKontakt\nVaskerobotter\nDe ultimative vaskerobotter til svinestalde\nKlik her\nKyllingehusvasker\nKraftfuld og solid vaskerobot til  kyllingehuse\nKlik her\nTankvasker\nIntelligent rengøring af tanke og siloer\nKlik her\nFiskepumpe\nSkånsomt håndtering af fisk i dambrug og RAS-anlæg\nKlik her\nKartoffelkassevasker\nEffektivt vask af kasser til kartofler\nKlik herProCleaner X100\nKraftfuld, fleksibel og driftsikker vaskerobotVi tør godt kalde ProCleaner X100 den ultimative vaskerobot. ProCleaner X100 er udviklet og testet gennem mange år, og har vist sit værd både for landmanden og de medarbejdere, som bruger robotten i deres dagligdag. X100 beskrives af kunderne som “en effektiv og driftssikker hjælp i hverdagen”.\nBook en demo\nLæs og hør hvad vores kunder siger\nOvergaard Svineproduktion\nHos Overgaard Svineproduktion har vaskerobotterne for alvor forandret måden, der bliver gjort rent i staldene på.\nLæs casen\nThorben Agger\nVaskerobot løfter arbejdsmiljøet og effektiviteten hos landmand Thorben Agger ved Lemvig.\nLæs casen\nBrugt vaskerobot\nPå Røjkumgård er det helt naturligt i forvejen at købe brugt, så da de hørte om muligheden her, var valget enkelt.\nLæs casen\nKalkunfarm i Østtyskland\nDen hårde opgave med at vaske kalkunstalden er nu erstattet af en automatisk løsning.\nLæs casen\nBrüggli Forellen i Schweiz\nFiskepumpe øger kapaciteten og forbedrer brugervenligheden når Brüggli Forellen flytter fisk.\nLæs casen\nDanish Salmon\nFiskepumpe fra Washpower flytter laks med stor fleksibilitet og giver besparelser hos Danish Salmon.\nLæs casen\nAgerbo Agro\nHos Agerbo Agro sparer man nu både tid og omkostninger med deres nye vaskerobot.\nLæs casen\nHvidtfeldtgaard\nSom sidste led i optimeringen af deres vaskerobotter, har Hvidtfeldtgaard nu tegnet en serviceaftale med Washpower.\nLæs casen\nFårtoft Genetik\nEffektiviseret vaskearbejde, meget bedre vask og man har nu tid til at få vasket stalden i bund hver gang.\nLæs casen\nWashpower A/S\nElmevej 87870 RoslevDenmark+45 96 96 10 15info@washpower.com\nPrivatlivspolitik\nInfo\nInvoice: invoice@washpower.com\nService: globalsupport@washpower.com\nCVR: 37808172\nKontakt\nFollow us\nFølgFølgFølg\nAdministrer samtykke\nFor at give dig de bedste oplevelser bruger vi teknologier som cookies til at gemme og/eller få adgang til enhedsoplysninger. Hvis du giver dit samtykke til disse teknologier, kan vi behandle data som f.eks. browsingadfærd eller unikke ID'er på dette websted. Hvis du ikke giver dit samtykke eller trækker dit samtykke tilbage, kan det have en negativ indvirkning på visse funktioner og egenskaber.\nFunktionsdygtig\nFunktionsdygtig\nAltid aktiv\nDen tekniske lagring eller adgang er strengt nødvendig med det legitime formål at muliggøre brugen af en specifik tjeneste, som abonnenten eller brugeren udtrykkeligt har anmodet om, eller udelukkende med det formål at overføre en kommunikation via et elektronisk kommunikationsnet.\nPreferences\nPreferences\nThe technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user.\nStatistikker\nStatistikker\nDen tekniske opbevaring eller adgang, der udelukkende bruges til statistiske formål.\nThe technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you.\nMarketing\nMarketing\nDen tekniske lagring eller adgang er nødvendig for at oprette brugerprofiler med henblik på at sende reklamer eller for at spore brugeren på et websted eller på tværs af flere websteder med henblik på lignende markedsføringsformål.\nVælg muligheder\nAdministrér tjenester\nAdministrer {vendor_count} leverandører\nLæs mere om disse formål\nAccepter\nAfvis\nVores præferencer\nGem præferencer\nVores præferencer\n{title}\n{title}\n{title}Administrer samtykke",

Name: SKAKO Vibration
Description:
SKAKO Vibration is a highly professional and experienced business partner specializing in the design, development, supply, and marketing of vibratory equipment, which activates, transports, and separates bulk solids.

The principle aim of SKAKO Vibration is to develop solutions utilizing vibration engineering technology, to meet our customers’ present and future individual needs while simultaneously strengthening their position in their market and providing added value to their business.

We strive to reach this goal by applying a high degree of knowledge, flexibility, and understanding of our customers’ requirements. We believe this cornerstone of our success results from total liaison and cooperation with our customers.

Name: DIS - CREADIS Engineering Solutions & Consulting
Description:
DIS/CREADIS is an international knowledge company. The driving force behind our company is a passion for technology and for finding optimized and sustainable solutions to technical challenges. 
Behind DIS/CREADIS are more than 700 highly qualified employees. It is our ambition to attract the best Engineers in their field, in order to excel in performance to our customers. We deliver integrated solutions to global technology leaders across all disciplines as Mechanical, Software, Hardware, Electrical and Automation engineering.
DIS/CREADIS was founded in 1997 and is represented in Denmark, Poland, Spain, France, India and USA, has a total of 17 departments worldwide. In Denmark, the name is DIS and internationally the name is CREADIS.

123
Global and local presence and execution
Recognized globally as CREADIS, and known as DIS in our native Denmark, we have come a long way since our humble inception. Today, DIS/CREADIS has expanded to encompass over 600 brilliant engineers situated across Denmark, Poland, Spain, France, India, and the United States
Contact us
Latest cases
Case
SolarFuture
Advanced simulation and grid compliance for large-scale solar project
This project was initiated at the request of SolarFuture, an innovative player in the renewable energy sector, with the goal of developing a solar power plant for a heating plant in Denmark. The heating plant expressed a desire to integrate more solar energy into their existing energy system to complement their air-to-water heat pump.
Read the full story
Case
EPOS
Harmonizing design & sound – leveraging specialized engineering expertise with DIS/CREADIS
EPOS, renowned for their unwavering commitment to high-end audio solutions, consistently pushes the envelope in a rapidly evolving market. Now, their sights are set on unlocking new avenues within their Air Traffic Control/C3 division.
Read the full story
Case
VELUX
Helping VELUX illuminate new horizons with DIS/CREADIS
VELUX, a renowned leader in the development and distribution of roof windows, has consistently strived to bring natural light and fresh air into homes and buildings worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to innovation, VELUX’s dedicated Innovation department continually explores new avenues that bring increased daylight and fresh air to people’s lives.
Read the full story
Case
SENSEWind
Accelerating time to market for self-erecting nacelle and service system with DIS/CREADIS’ concept development expertise
The costs of assembly, installation, operation, and maintenance of wind farms are rising, driven by increases in WTG (wind turbine generator) size and ideal wind farm placements moving to harder-to-access locations (e.g., deeper, more remote waters). For Onshore, the cost of just crane usage for a turbine installation can amount to hundreds of thousands of dollars every day, and even more offshore where specialty vessels are required.
Read the full story

Name: Cephalon A/S
Description:
Cephalon is the leading supplier of electrodiagnostic devices and supplies to hospital and specialists in the Nordic region.

Specialist in Neuro and Imaging applications.

We can provide a wide range of systems and solutions for EEG, EMG, NCS, ERP, fMRI, IOM, ERG, TCD, Neuro Imaging, Magnetic Stimulation, Sleep, Apnea, Heat/Cold & Pain Sensation and many more applications.

Name: Fastems
Description:
Fastems is the leading supplier of CNC automation solutions for variable batch production, also known as high-mix, low-volume manufacturing. We’re an open integrator with over 40 years and 4000 installations of experience with 90+ machine tool brands.

Fastems typically automates 3-5 axis milling machines, turning and turn-mill machines, grinding machines and more. Our MMS control connects to various data systems and is praised for its production planning and resource management features that enable you to take control of your production.

Fastems integrates and automates measuring, washing, marking, finishing and various other devices or processes to be part of our intelligent CNC automation systems.  We also offer deburring and robotic finishing cells (RFC) and robotic systems for automated part loading to/from pallets (ALD). Solutions for cutting tool automation including pre-setters are also included.

What if your production would only do the right things, at the right time – all the time?

Sign in to myFastems!Manufacturing Management SoftwareThe Benefits
Why is MMS good for your production?Typical Applications
What kind of machine setups is MMS suitable for?Compare
What makes MMS the best software?Production Process
How is this done in practice?See MMS in action
Check out our video materials to see MMS in actionDownload our guide
Download our ultimate guide for CNC automation and check out other related contentHome / Offering / MMS – Manufacturing Management SoftwareThe Software to Plan, Run and Monitor Your ProductionMMS is the production control software of all Fastems automation solutions, as well as a stand-alone software to help planning and organizing non-automated production cells. MMS plans, runs and monitors high-mix production – all in one.The basic idea is to integrate production planning, production resources and machinery into a single software that operates your high-mix-low-volume CNC production in timely and economical manner. From a single machine tool to tens of them, MMS already is the choice of thousands of CNC manufacturers.Download brochureDo the right things, at the right time – all the timeWhy Is MMS Good for Your Production?With MMS, you can remove all the excess from your process: manual production planning, re-planning when changes occur, repeating production setups, waiting for missing resources such as cutting tools, and many other daily hassles that happen in every shop floor running a mix of parts.ENSURE TIMELY DELIVERIESAutomated Production PlanningMMS generates production plan automatically based on your order due dates, inventory balance OR recurring production batches. It is a real-time software – when more urgent order or other production change occurs, the production plan updates automatically.LOWER SETUP TIMESPredictive Resource ManagementMMS calculates – even days ahead – the optimized production workflow and the needed production resources like NC programs, raw materials, tools and work holding for every order. In-advance resource preparation guarantees low machine waiting times and less work-in-process.MANUFACTURING INSIGHTSReal-Time Production MonitoringMMS tracks all the key performance indicators and gives insights for everyone working in production on how to improve. Whether it is monitoring the OEE, machine tool utilization and available resources, or improving production with practical tips and hints, MMS covers it all.REPRODUCIBLE PROCESSESVarious Integration OptionsThe less manual work between the production phases, the more reproducible is the process. MMS integrates with milling, turning and various other kinds of machine tools and other machinery; value adding processes like tool automation and finishing, as well as data systems like ERP, CAM and TDM.“We build to demand as opposed to building to inventory. We can upload the ERP data and let MMS schedule everything, and it’ll tell us in advance which NC programs, raw materials, tools and fixtures are required.”
CEO of Advanced Machining & FabricatingRead the whole case story hereMMS for Automated or Stand-Alone Milling and Turning MachinesMMS suits for diverse production needs: as an automation control for milling and turning machine tools; or as a production planning and guidance software for non-automated work phases. You can select one of the modes or have all of them in your MMS, just the way you like it.4 AND 5 AXIS MILLING MACHINESMMS for Milling AutomationProduction control software for pallet based automation solutions (FMS)Detailed production scheduling for the entire systemAdaptive production simulation based on real-time data up to 96 hours aheadSeamless real-time manufacturing process control and visibility over the whole productionExtendable with integrated tool automationRead more about milling automationTURNING MACHINES AND TURN-MILLSMMS for Turning AutomationBatch production and setup scheduling for lathes and milling machinesCoordinate-based material management with configurable matricesTop-of-the-line production control for advanced part handling solutionsIdeal control software for high-mix productionRead more about turning automationAUTOMATED PRODUCTION PLANNING FOR NON-AUTOMATED OPERATIONSMMS for Stand-Alone MachinesScheduling for stand-alone machines and other manufacturing operations such as inspection and qualitySeamless real-time manufacturing process control and visibility over stand-alone and automated manufacturing operationsBatch production and setup change schedulingSeamless production flow over automated and non-automated work cellsRead more about WCOWhat Makes MMS the Best Automation Software?The wide integration options with different machinery and data systems, intelligent production resource check and scheduling capabilities, and real-time production monitoring are what make MMS a superior automation software for mixed manufacturing needs.FeaturesComparisonTraditional Automation SoftwareMMS
Production schedulingManualAutomatic
Production KPI reportsSingle machineWhole system, real time
Tool lifetime managementNoYes
Production resource management*PartlyFull
Automatic real-time KPI reportsNoYes
Easy-use mode for single-machine systemsNoYesInterfacesComparisonTraditional Automation SoftwareMMS

Other machinery*NoYesThe Production Process with MMSMMS is always one step ahead by automatically calculating the optimized production workflow and necessary resources based on orders. It adapts automatically to changes in your daily production schedule and displays useful insights to maintain the production output.See MMS in action1 | Production Planning & SchedulingMMS automatically plans and schedules production based on the customer orders input manually or via ERP interface. It tracks changes in real-time and when something unexpected happens or priorities change, it automatically adjusts the production schedule.2 | Resource CheckAll the needed production resources are automatically checked in advance: NC programs, machines, tools, materials and fixtures. If anything is missing, MMS alerts early to ensure everything will be in place before the planned production time.3 | Production ExecutionAfter creating the production plan and the resource check, MMS executes production, leaving just the part clamping and unloading to the operators. To ensure high quality from the first workpiece onward, MMS is able to store your instructions, pictures, documents and videos to guide the employees through every step.4 | Following Production KPIsMMS gives you a graphical real-time overviews of key performance indicators like spindle utilization rates, machine capacities and OEE. The Insights mode also gives practical suggestions on how to utilize production capacity even better, such as adding or removing certain tools, removing unused fixtures to free storage capacity, or fixing problems causing tool breakages.See MMS in ActionProfit with AutomationCutting Edge DataProgram LibraryMaterial ManagementMMS Dashboard8760 SpeedometerWant to Learn More about the Benefits on Utilizing MMS for Your Production Efficiency?Here are couple of hand-picked content pieces you might want to check out!Have questions? Sign in to myFastems!CNC Automation SystemsTypes of Automation
What kind of automation do we supplyTypes of Machines and Equipment
Which machines and equipment do we automateSolution Finder
Find out your automation systemLearn about automation
Download CNC automation guideWhat Kind of Automation Fastems Supplies?We offer a wide range of flexible manufacturing systems (FMS) for milling and turning machine tools, used in variable batch production. We also automate and integrate CNC supportive processes and supply solutions for cutting tool and tool data management. All of our systems come equipped with industry-leading control Manufacturing Management Software (MMS).Pallet Handling SystemsFastems supplies automation for pallet and zero-point plate machines tools in payloads of 50 – 10 000+ kg (with pallet).These are typically 3-5 axis milling machines, machining centers, grinding machines or vertical turning machines. We offer everything from small modular systems for 1-3 machine tools to large tailored solutions with 10+ CNC machines of different kind.Fastems can integrate your auxiliary processes like washing, measuring or marking to be part of your pallet automation system. Tool and tool data automation is also getting increasingly common. Our pallet handling systems are always equipped with the industry leading MMS control software that makes variable batch production flexible and efficient.Read more about milling automation.Part Handling SystemsFastems supplies part handling automation systems in payloads of 1 – 500+ kg.Typical automated CNC machines are single or dual spindle lathes, turn/mills, 5-axis milling machines, grinding or honing machines and more. We offer smaller systems for 1-2 lathes all the way to complex agile manufacturing systems with 10+ machines.Fastems can integrate your auxiliary processes like washing, measuring or marking to be included in your part handling automation system. Tool and tool data automation is also getting increasingly common. Our part handling systems are always equipped with the industry leading MMS control software that makes variable batch production flexible and efficient.Read more about turning automationCNC Supportive Process IntegrationAs the automation level increases, so do productivity and quality.Fastems integrates and automates measuring, washing, marking, finishing and various other devices or processes to be part of our intelligent CNC automation systems.  We also offer deburring and robotic finishing cells (RFC) and robotic systems for automated part loading to/from pallets (ALD).Tool and tool data management are important topics especially when there are lot’s of machines and tools, materials are though and in securing the unmanned shifts form errors. The use of AGVs for pallet, workpiece or tool transferring between manufacturing operations is getting also more common and we offer integration services for them.Read more about CNC supportive process integrationSolution FinderUse the filters below to find the suitable automation solution for your manufacturing setup.
FPT – Flexible Pallet Tower
Easy plug-and-play pallet tower that supersedes traditional pallet pools and automatic pallet changers.
View product
FPS – Flexible Pallet System
Modular FMS for multiple 4 or 5 axis milling or mill-turn machine tools with 300 to 630 mm pallets or zero-point plates.
View product
RFC – Robotic Finishing Cell
Modular RFC, a robot-supported automation system for the flexible deburring of different workpieces
View product
FPC – Flexible Pallet Container
Easy and extendable pallet automation solution that supersedes pallet pools and automatic pallet changers.
View product
MLS – Multi Level System
MLS automates any machine tools for flexible manufacturing. It comes with the industry leading software, and tool automation and various auxiliary processes can be integrated.
View product
RoboFMS – Robotic FMS
All the benefits of flexible manufacturing for 5-axis machines with no pallet.
View productWhat Kind of CNC Machines and Equipment We Automate?Fastems can automate an exceptionally wide range of CNC machinery and supportive processes that are typically integrated into be part of a larger automation system. Automating cutting tool (data) management or an existing machine tool is also in our scope.Milling and Mill-turn Machine ToolsWe have solutions for 3-5-axis milling machines, mill-turns and machining centers. Pallet sizes vary from 300-1600mm+ and we also automate zero-point-plate machines.Read about milling automation solutionsTurning and Turn-Mill Machine ToolsWe automate various turning machines from single spindle and dual spindle turning machines to turn-mills. The machines can also feature a bar feeder.Read about turning automation solutionsOther Metalworking ProcessesWe automate grinding, drilling, threading, boring, honing, sawing, forming and other CNC machines. In particular, we supply robotic cells (RFC) for various finishing operations – integrated or as stand-alone.Read about automating other metalworking processesExisting Machine Tool AutomationDepending on the CNC machine, automating already-in-production equipment is possible and profitable.Read about existing machine tool automationCutting Tool ManagementWe supply automation for tool transfers between machines and central tool storage as well as tool off-set data management using our MMS control.Read about tool management and automationCNC Machining Supportive OperationsFastems integrates washing, measuring, marking, deburring, polishing, grinding and other finishing, heat-treatment, assembly, welding and many other CNC supportive operations including AGV integrations.Read about automating supportive processesNext steps? Download the Guide for CNC Automation!If you are under consideration on how to reduce cost per unit, cut down setup costs, increase unmanned production or reduce WIP or inventory, this guide is the one to download.

Home/Offering/Digital Manufacturing
What is digital manufacturing?
Visualize and manage your manufacturing with digital solutions
With our Digital Manufacturing solutions, you can monitor your production with data- and process-driven, timely-available insights, so as to reduce lead times improve delivery performance, resource utilization and overall quality.
Start utilizing data for your manufacturing with our solutions now!
Explore the solutions
Digital Manufacturing Solutions
Factory Cockpit
Factory Cockpit integrates, collects, visualizes and analyzes data from IT systems (such as ERP, APS, MES) and shop floor devices (such as machine tools and automation systems) to make the production process transparent across the factory and supply chain partners. This solution is developed to provide situational awareness for continuous learning, data-informed production development, improved collaboration, and decision-making, and leadership within the manufacturing context.
Visit Factory Cockpit Homepage
Work Cell Operations
Combining key functions of MES and APS, Work Cell Operations focus on providing well instructed information for shop floor planning and execution,  operator tasks and work reporting for stand-alone machine tools and manually operated workstations. Especially, with WCO Cloud version, you can take up a 3-month trial period to experience all the benefits of WCO, with only a small set up fee!
Learn more about WCO

Body Text URL_5:
Skip to contentHomeSolutionFeaturesResourcesAbout usBook a demoLead Manufacturing With DataFactory Cockpit – Make the data work for youThe ChallengeMost manufacturers lack accurate real-time information about their manufacturing status and performance. Information is often siloed into multiple, separate systems which are not integrated with each other and with shop floor device data. At the same time manufacturing environment is getting more complex and volatile. The future success is built upon the sustained relationship between manufacturers and customers. And that, can only be achieved with information transparency, agile, continuous development and seamless collaboration.Factory Cockpitsolves the challenge by bringing together data from your shopfloor devices and IT systems, providing real-time situational awareness. It visualizes and analyzes the data, allowing you to make well-informed decisions, to lead and continuously develop your manufacturing. Factory Cockpit enhances flexibility and efficiency through transparency, improves employee satisfaction, and helps you become the most valuable partner for your customers.Explore our solutionsReasons to get startedA low-risk way to create situational awareness and constant optimizationWe integrate existing production IT systems and shop floor resources to create a digital twin of your manufacturing process. The solution can be adopted in steps to meet your manufacturing requirements and the growing business demands. As part of Fastems, we understand the realities of part manufacturing and how to push the boundaries for the next step of efficiency.Harness your data for AI-readinessUtilizing your data today positions you perfectly for tapping into machine learning technologies in the coming years. As Factory Cockpit and technologies evolve, you will have a platform implementing improvements based on process simulations and artificial intelligence. Not far off in the future, this will enable you making AI-assisted decisions.Lead a cultural shift towards collaboration and transparencyAs a solution that assists decisions and ways of working, Factory Cockpit intuitively nurtures a culture of constant improvement and collaboration. While changes are never easy, transparency and holistic view of your manufacturing helps facilitating decisions and driving changes.Upcoming Events
EMO 2025
September, 22 – 26
Hanover, Germany
Visit Fastems at EMO 2025: Discover flexible CNC automation and intelligent production control – Hall 12, Booth B54. Get your free day ticket now.
Learn more & attend

Name: Trussmatic
Description:
Trussmatic is the world’s leading producer of Fully Automatic Solutions for the Building Component Manufacturing Industry.  Trussmatic automatic roof truss production technology is based on patented Smart Robotics Solution.

The company has developed strong IP for Vertical Roof Trusses in key global markets. The core invention consists of proprietary process automation systems and smart robotics using patented Internet-of-Things supported technologies with online monitoring capabilities.

Trussmatic is an independent vendor for the Building Component Manufacturers.

The technology has been developed for over 10 years.

NEWS
CAREER
ABOUT US
CONTACT US
ABOUT US
Trussmatic is the world’s leading producer of Fully Automatic Solutions for the Building Component Manufacturing Industry.  Trussmatic automatic roof truss production technology is based on patented Smart Robotics Solution.
TRUSSMATIC                                        The company has developed strong IP for Vertical Roof Trusses, Wall Elements and Floor Trusses in key global markets. The core invention consists of proprietary process automation systems and smart robotics using patented Internet-of-Things supported technologies with online monitoring capabilities.
Trussmatic is an independent vendor for the Building Component Manufacturers.
The technology has been developed for over 10 years.
Ownership
The company is privately owned, and the main owners have an extensive and broad international experience in the wood processing, construction, roofing, furniture and ICT industries.
Management
Trussmatic management has a solid track record in the wood processing industries. The core competences are:Automation and smart robotics
Software development
Planning, delivering and ramping-up of turn-key production lines especially in the wood working industry
Project management
International business
COMPANY IN NUMBERS
different continents
+
automated lines
years development
#
leading in the industry
Over the past seven years, Palsgaard Spær has worked closely with Trussmatic on the strategic purchase, installation, commissioning, and development of a fully automated robot line for truss manufacturing.
Throughout this collaboration, we have found Trussmatic to be a persistent supplier, contributing to the implementation of our project. While there were challenges in achieving optimal operation, through a shared understanding and extraordinary efforts from both the supplier and our team, the project has reached its goals. I would be pleased to provide a brief reference outlining our experience.
SIMON
palsgaard Spaer

Name: KL Mechanics Oy
Description:
Mechanical Engineering from Design to Assembly 

KL Mechanics is well-known as a contract manufacturer of high-quality subcontracted machining. At KL Mechanics, we offer versatility, high capability and comprehensive services.Our designers' solutions range from precision mechanics to demanding assemblies and automation equipment. Expertise, experience and high-quality design software meet at KL Mechanics, and we are able to respond to our clients' needs quickly and flexibly.

Modern technology in the form of multi-axle CNC machines and multi-function lathes enables high precision and short lead times. KL Mechanics has long-term experience in working with demanding materials such as plastics and special steels. Our machine stock enables proto and small-series production flexibly and cost-effectively. KL Mechanics is an expert in demanding equipment assemblies. Our specialty is production tools of our own design such as test beds and assembly jigs. Our final assemblies consist of machined mechanical parts and carefully selected purchased components.

International principals in the foodstuffs, electronics, process, automation and energy industries form the clientele of KL Mechanics. Our key values are customer-orientation, trust, punctuality and flexibility. They mean high quality, quick deliveries, projects carried out effectively and cost-effectiveness.

Do not sell or share my personal informationDeny Allow selection Customize Allow all\nENFIEtusivuRatkaisut\nTuotekehitys ja tuotteistaminen\nAlihankinta ja sopimusvalmistus\nTuotannon työkalut ja testerit\nRobottitarttujat ja tuotantoautomaatio\nServiceSuunnitteluKoneistusMuovituotteetKokoonpano3D-mittausYritys\nKL Mechanics Oy\nKL Tools\nVastuullisuus\nAjankohtaista\nMedialle\nMeille töihinYhteystiedot\nENEtusivuRatkaisut\nTuotekehitys ja tuotteistaminen\nAlihankinta ja sopimusvalmistus\nTuotannon työkalut ja testerit\nRobottitarttujat ja tuotantoautomaatio\nServiceSuunnitteluKoneistusMuovituotteetKokoonpano3D-mittausYritys\nKL Mechanics Oy\nKL Tools\nVastuullisuus\nAjankohtaista\nMedialle\nMeille töihinYhteystiedot\nSERIES\nOF\nDETAILS\nKL Mechanics on täyden palvelun mekaniikkatalo.\nSuunnittelu\nKoneistus\nKokoonpano\nMuovituotteet\nKatso video\nSeries of Details\nKL Mechanics on vahva ja arvostettu hienomekaniikan sopimusvalmistaja yli 30-vuoden kokemuksella. Modernit CNC-työstökoneet sekä ammattitaitoinen henkilökunta ovat tehokkaan ja laadukkaan toimintamme perusta. Tarjoamme ja valmistamme vaatimustenne mukaisesti osat ja kokoonpanot yksittäiskappaleista sarjoihin. Meiltä saat myös ruiskupuristetuotteet kokonaispakettina oman muottisuunnittelun, muottivalmistuksen sekä ruiskupuristetuotannon ansiosta.Kun vaaditte mekaniikkatoimittajalta tehokuutta, laatua ja toimitusvarmuutta, osaatte arvostaa KL Mechanicsin ja KL Toolsin kokemusta ja tapaa toimia.\nLue lisää\nPaikkoja auki CNC-Koneistajille ja CNC-Sorvareille\n04.07.2025\nLue lisää\n30\nyears of\nexperience\nKL Mechanics •  KL Tools\nLataa Esitteemme\nLataa haluamasi esitteet\nValitse haluamasi esite, täytä nimesi, sähköpostisi ja yrityksesi. Esite lähetetään sähköpostitse.\nKonekanta\nNimi *\nSähköposti *\nYritys *Lataa\nEtusivuRatkaisut\nTuotekehitys ja tuotteistaminenAlihankinta ja sopimusvalmistusTuotannon työkalut ja testeritRobottitarttujat ja tuotantoautomaatioServiceSuunnitteluKoneistusMuovituotteetKokoonpano3D-mittausYritys\nKL Mechanics OyKL ToolsVastuullisuusAjankohtaistaMedialleMeille töihinYhteystiedot\nKL Mechanics Oy\nLummintie 16, 90460 Oulunsalo\nKL Tools Oy\nAutomaatiotie 1, 90460 Oulunsalo\n© KL Mechanics, all rights reserved\nRekisteriseloste | WhistleblowingTilaa uutiskirjeemme",

3D-mit­taus | 3D-mit­taus­pal­ve­lu
KL Mechanicsilla 3D mittaus ja koordinaatiomittaus tapahtuu tarkkuusmittaukseen räätälöidyssä mittahuoneessa.
Etusivu|3D-mittaus
3D-MITTAUSKL Mechanicsilla koordinaatiomittaus tapahtuu tarkkuusmittaukseen räätälöidyssä mittahuoneessa, jossa avainkoneena on koskettava Mitutoyo CMM-mittakone. 0,1 mikrometrin toleranssiin yltävässä koneessa on kääntyvä mittapää, pienin mittakärki on 0,3 mm. Huoneen lämpötila on kontrolloitu.Mittaamme kolmannen osapuolen valmistamat tuotteet ja osat sekä käytämme 3D-mittausta myös oman tuotannon laadunvarmistamiseen, mm. muovituotteiden muottien ja sarjojen ensimmäisten kappaleiden mittaukseen.Ota yhteyttä

Tuotannon työkalut | Laitesuunnittelu
Suunnittelemme, valmistamme ja kokoonpanemme tuotannon työkaluja ja testereitä mekaanisista jigeistä vaativiin automatisoituihin testereihin.
Etusivu|Ratkaisut|Tuotannon työkalut ja testerit
Tuotannon työkalutSuunnittelemme, valmistamme ja kokoonpanemme erilaisia tuotannon työkaluja ja testereitä yksinkertaisista mekaanisista jigeistä vaativiin automatisoituihin testereihin. Projekti alkaa lähtötietojen määrityksellä ja etenee konseptisuunnittelun ja laitesuunnittelun kautta itse valmistukseen, kokoonpanoon ja testaukseen. Laajemmissa projekteissa suunnittelijamme voivat toimia myös alusta alkaen asiakkaan tiloissa.Oman suunnittelun ja valmistuksen välinen saumaton kommunikaatio takaa parhaan lopputuloksen ja mahdollistaa nopeat muutokset tuotannossa.Tarvittaessa toteutamme projektin myös asiakkaan toimittamien dokumenttien perusteella.Toteutamme räätälöidysti mm.Ruuvaus-, asennus- ja juotosjigit
Kokoonpanoalustat
Manuaaliset ja automaattiset puristimet
Mekaaniset ja pneumaattiset asennustyökalut
Automaattiset testeriratkaisut
Ohjelmointijigit
Neulapetitesterit
Manuaaliset, sähkö- tai paineilmakäyttöiset testeritValmistettavan työkalun käyttötarkoituksen mukaan teemme laitteelle vaadittavat turvallisuus- ja riskiarvioinnit sekä FEM-laskennat ja haemme CE-merkinnät ja sertifikaatit.

Sopimusvalmistus
Koneistuspalvelut ja alihankinta teollisuudelle, koneistus alihankinta, sopimusvalmistus, osavalmistus alihankinta, kokoonpano alihankinta, tuotantoeräoptimointi, muovituotteet alihankinta, Koneistus, Alihankinta, Tuotekehitys
Etusivu|Ratkaisut|Alihankinta ja sopimusvalmistus
Laadukasta sopimusvalmistustaKL Mechanics on luotettava ja sertifioitu sopimusvalmistaja. Asiakaslähtöinen ja laaja palvelutarjontamme saman katon alta takaa ketterän alihankinnan niin koneistuksen, osavalmistuksen kuin kokoonpanon osalta.AlihankintapalvelutToteutamme alihankintana koneistuspalveluja, muovituotantoa, kokoonpanoja ja mekaniikan suunnittelua sekä niihin liittyviä mittauspalveluja. Koneistuksen erätuotantomme tyypillinen eräkoko on CNC-työstökeskuksilla 1–100 kpl, monitoimisorveilla 50–1500 kpl. Investoimme osaamiseen, ohjelmiin, menetelmiin ja tiloihin taataksemme korkean laadun ja toiminnan tehokkuuden.Tiloistamme löytyy kolme erillistä kokoonpanotilaa: mekaanisten laitteiden ja työkalujen, mittalaitteiden ja hitsattavien kokoonpanojen linjat.Meiltä saat myös muovituotteiden koko kaaren palvelut muottisuunnittelusta valmistukseen saumattomasti yhdeltä toimijalta.Ota yhteyttä

Ko­neis­tus
KL Mechanics on vahva osaaja koneistuksessa. Meiltä saat koneistuspalvelut ja koneistustarvikkeet saman katon alta.
Etusivu|Koneistus
KoneistuspalveluModernit ja tehokaat työstökeskuksetKL Mechanics on aina ollut vahva osaaja 5-akseliskoneistuksessa, jolla voidaan toteuttaa vaativia mittatarkkoja osia yhdellä kiinnityksellä, kuten muotteja, mittalaitteiden ja testerien osia, gimbalit sekä optiikkamoduulit. Koneistamme myös lasersintratut ja valetut alumiiniaihiot määrämittaan.Konekantaamme kuuluu kääntöpöydällä varustettuja, alumiini- ja muoviosien sarjakoneistukseen soveltuvia 4-akselisia työstökeskuksia sekä raskaampaa koneistusta varten vaakakaraiset Mori Seiki -keskukset paletinvaihtajilla sekä LANG-nollapistekiinnityksillä. Valmistamme yksittäiskappaleet ja protot sekä pienet ja keskisuuret valmistuserät (1-500 kpl).MonitoimisorvitMonitoimisorveilla koneistetaan tarkasti perinteiset pyörähdyskappaleet sekä haastavat kappaleet, joiden sarjavalmistamisessa hyödynnetään tankoautomaattien tehokkuutta, jyrsinnän monipuolisuutta ja tarkkuutta  Monitoimisorveilla toteutetaan sekä yksittäiskappaleita että suuria sarjoja. Kompleksiset koneistusosat valmistuvat kerralla – nopeasti ja korkealla tarkkuudella. Avainkoneitamme ovat Mori Seiki- ja Tsugami-sorvit pyörivillä työkaluilla ja automaattisella tangonsyötöllä.Suuret kappaleet ja osatOlemme hienomekaniikan koneistaja ja levymäisten kappaleiden koneistamiseen meiltä löytyy yksi Pohjois-Suomen isoliikkeisimmistä työstökeskuksista; huhtikuussa 2020 käyttöönotettu 5-akselinen DMG Mori DFM260/11, jonka maksimi työstöala on vaikuttavat 2600mm x 1100mm.  Moniakselisuus mahdollistaa pääty- ja kylkireikien koneistamisen yhdellä asetuksella.  Pienempien levyjen koneistamiseen useita pystykaraisia 3- ja 4-akselisia CNC-koneita. Tyypillisiä työstettäviä kappaleita ovat muottikappaleet, suuret pohjalevyt, sivulevyt, johteet sekä mittaankoneistetut hitsattavat teräsrakenteet.
Lataa tästä haluamasi esitteetOta yhteyttä

KL Mechanics Oy
Mekaniikkasuunnittelua, koneistusta ja kokoonpanoa jo yli 25 vuotta.
Etusivu|Yritys|KL Mechanics Oy
KL Mechanics OyKL Mechanics on osaamisestaan tunnettu, täyden palvelun mekaniikkatalo.Keimo Lukkarila aloitti koneistamiseen liittyvän yritystoiminnan vuonna 1991. Nykyisen yrityksen perusta valettiin vuonna 1998, kun perustettiin K. Lukkarila Oy.  Tänä päivänä yritys työllistää noin 110 henkeä kahdessa eri toimipisteessä.Modernit tuotantotilamme ja myynti sijaitsevat Oulussa, 5 minuutin päässä Suomen toiseksi vilkkaimmalta lentokentältä.KL Mechanics Oy
Lummintie 16
90460 Oulunsalo

Tuotantoautomaatio | Tuotannon automatisointi
Toteutamme erilaiset kappaleenkäsittelyn kokoonpanot sekä niiden tuotannon automatisoinnin. Tuotantoautomaatiolla saadaa ketteryyttä tuotantoon.
Etusivu|Ratkaisut|Robottitarttujat ja tuotantoautomaatio
TuotantoautomaatioToteutamme erilaiset kappaleenkäsittelyn mekaaniset kokoonpanot sekä niiden tuotannon automatisoinnin. Usein robottisolu on osa laajempaa projektia, jossa päätoimittajana toimii integraattori. Teemme suunnittelun suoraan asiakkaalle tai alihankintana integraattorille, ja tuotannon automatisoinnin ratkaisut suunnittelemme aina yhteistyössä asiakkaan ja robottitoimittajan kanssa.Roboteilla ja automaatiolla haetaan tuotantoon ketteryyttä ja joustoa henkilöresurssien kohdentamisen, läpäisyajan lyhentämisen ja toistotarkkuuden parantamisen kautta. Erätuotannon automatisoinnissa robotti-investointi maksaa itsensä takaisin tyypillisesti 1–3 vuodessa.Toteutamme kaikki robottiin liitettävät kappaleen käsittelyn työkalut, kuten pick&place-tarttujat, 3D-alipainetarttujat sekä prosessiteollisuuden levytarttujat.Ota yhteyttä

Name: Vaski
Description:
Vaski delivers machinery and automation solutions designed to create efficiency for the future. Our solutions aim to redefine through simplification the rules of industrial manufacturing. Our passion for excellence can be found in every machine that we design.

Our key products are:
    Flat bar conversion machinery (typically busbar) for punching, bending, end finishing and coiling
    Sheet metal cut to length and slitting machinery from coils
    Custom automation and machinery

Vaski creates partnerships for life and is committed to making your life as a manufacturer easier. We design machines that are flexible and high quality solutions for decades to come. We measure our success in watching you enter the next era of production.

Why Vaski?
Company

Vaski Machines
Imagine your material handling process more efficient
Contact us
Vaski Machines
Vaski stands at the forefront of automation in flat bar processing, optimised sheet metal handling and custom machines for various industrial needs. Our mission is to create efficiency and further automate the industry.
Flat Bar
One of the standout features in modern busbar processing is the implementation of all-electric, high-speed machinery. These machines not only cater to the increasing demands for energy efficiency but also maintain high reliability and production rates
Flat bar solutions
Sheet metal
A modular range of blanking and slitting solutions from coiled sheet metal. Coil processing machines deliver a significant leap forward material utilisation.
Sheet metal solutions
Automation and Custom
Enhancing efficiency in industrial manufacturing with automation and customised solutions for diverse industrial needs.
Automation and Custom

Find out why working with us is worth it.

Automate your busbar production to a whole new level, check out VaskiFLOW.

VaskiSTORIES
Why Vaski?
Company
Contact us
Automation and Custom
Streamlining industrial manufacturing with Vaski.
Contact us
Automation
and Custom Machines
Vaski offers customised machines, material handling and automation solutions for a wide variety of applications. Vaski is always available to support your factory requirements. We take pride in making your automation ideas real and strive for the highest quality and productivity in your production.Vaski is your partner in every step of your production lifecycle. We originated and remain a key automation partner to a variety of industries also outside of flat bar and blanking & slitting. It is from this beginning and with a relentless focus on automation efficiency as well as our customer applications and needs that enable us to produce top quality, exceptionally innovative yet very practical automation and machinery solutions.We always appreciate invitations for our experts to review your production processes to see how we can work together to take your production to the next level. With Vaski’s expertise in design engineering and machine building, Vaski customers have peace of mind with their equipment choice in the knowledge it is designed and built to be high quality, reliable and user friendly.
Partnering for Success: From Concept to Completion
In the world of industrial manufacturing, a reliable partner can make all the difference. At [Your Company Name], we pride ourselves on being that partner—guiding you through every step of your production lifecycle. From initial consultation to after-sales support, we ensure a seamless experience that drives efficiency, productivity, and success.
A Comprehensive ApproachSales ConsultationEvery successful project starts with a conversation. Our experts take the time to understand your specific needs, industry challenges, and production goals. By collaborating closely with your team, we shape a solution tailored to your unique requirements.
Design EngineeringLeveraging cutting-edge technology and innovative engineering, we design machines and systems that integrate seamlessly into your production processes. Each solution is custom-built to deliver maximum value and efficiency.
Project ManagementA dedicated project manager oversees every stage of the process, ensuring clear communication, on-time delivery, and flawless execution. Your project is in safe hands from day one.
InstallationOur skilled installation team works quickly and efficiently, ensuring your equipment is operational with minimal downtime. We focus on precision, so your production line can start running without delays.
Commissioning and SupportWe go beyond installation by ensuring your equipment is fully commissioned and ready for use. Our team provides training for your staff and ongoing technical support to keep operations running smoothly.
After-Sales Service and Spare PartsOur partnership doesn’t end once your equipment is operational. We offer reliable after-sales services, including maintenance, troubleshooting, and spare parts delivery. With quick availability, we help minimise production interruptions and extend the lifespan of your machinery.
Turn your production challenges into seamless, efficient solutions
Read more
Koja Oy relies on Vaski’s special machinery planning and implementation skills
Read the story
Ask us more - we are happy to help!
We are happy to help you find solutions for your production. For custom and special machines, please contact our sales manager Juuso Aaltonen, +358 40 4894471, juuso.aaltonen@vaski.com.

VaskiSTORIES
Why Vaski?
Company
Contact us
Applications
Customised Solutions for Diverse Industries.
Contact us
Solutions for your industry
Understanding that each industry has unique demands, Vaski excels in providing customised solutions that cater to specific needs. Whether it's for construction, HVAC systems, or power distribution, Vaski's flexible design and manufacturing capabilities allow for bespoke solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing systems.
Energy Solutions
Vaski is transforming the landscape of power distribution and generation through its innovative, all-electric machinery designed specifically for the processing of copper and aluminum busbars and flat bars. This cutting-edge technology not only makes manufacturing processes more efficient but also significantly lowers expenses and improves the adaptability of materials.
Learn more
HVAC
Vaski stands out in the HVAC market, providing essential blanking and slitting products that support the production of the majority of HVAC components.
Learn more
Construction Materials
Vaski's machines, relevant for the construction materials sector, excel in roofing and facades, offering top-notch straightening and cutting for applications like guttering, roof plates, and ceiling panels.
Learn more
Metal Producers and Wholesalers
Vaski offers efficient blanking and slitting solutions with unique multi-coil tech and automatic storage, boosting flexibility and profitability for metal producers and sheet manufacturers by reducing stock and material expenses.
Learn more
Ask us more - we are happy to help!
Our global sales network helps you find the right solutions. Locate your nearest contact or reach out to us directly.
Contact us

Why Vaski?
Company
Contact us
Vaski Service
Comprehensive support to you machinery needs
Contact us
Vaski Service
We provide local support in over 15 countries and have remote service support available 24/7. We are there for our customers whether they need to ramp up their production, a machine checkup, training, or quality spare parts. With tailored modernization and retrofit solutions, we can deliver better performance and extra lifetime for existing machines. Contact us: services@vaski.com.
Remote Support
Industry 4.0-enabled Vaski machines feature remote support for troubleshooting and updates, along with 24/7 teleservice for quick resolution of breakdowns.
Spares
Vaski provides original spare parts and reconditioning services, including grinding shear and slitting blades, to ensure optimal performance and reduce costs. Our on-site machine shop facilitates efficient part reconditioning.
Field ServiceService Check-Ups and Consultation by technical experts
Consultancy & Training
Vaski offers training and consultancy services, including operator training, programming, maintenance, and production support.
Ask us more - we are happy to help!

Why Vaski?
Company
Contact us
Why Vaski?
We redefine and simplify the rules of industrial manufacturing
Why Choose Vaski?
Vaski specialises in delivering machinery and automation solutions designed to create efficiency for the future. Our solutions aim to redefine and simplify the rules of industrial manufacturing. Our passion for excellence is embedded in every machine we design.
We are dedicated to creating lifelong partnerships and making your life as a manufacturer easier. We design flexible, high-quality machines that provide reliable solutions for decades to come. We measure our success by helping you transition into the next era of production.
Industry Leadership
As a high-growth, innovative company, Vaski leads the global industry in bar and extrusion processing machinery, sheet metal cut-to-length and slitting machinery, as well as general industrial automation and custom machinery.
Commitment to R&D
Our dedication to research and development ensures that we integrate smart features into every solution we create. We invest in the latest technologies and innovative processes to enhance the performance and reliability of our machinery that meet the evolving needs of the industry and set new standards for efficiency and productivity.
Hands on service
Vaski's highly skilled support team is equipped to service a wide variety of machinery. Our comprehensive service ensure your machinery operates at peak performance, minimizing downtime and extending equipment lifespan.
Innovative solutions for future efficiency
At Vaski, we pride ourselves on our ability to redefine industrial manufacturing through simplification. Our cutting-edge solutions are engineered to create long-term efficiency, ensuring that your operations are not only streamlined but also future-proof.
Commitment to excellence
Every machine we design embodies our passion for excellence. We never take shortcuts and always strive to exceed expectations, both ours and yours. This commitment to quality ensures that our solutions are reliable, high-performing, and built to last.
Long-term partnerships
Vaski believes in building partnerships for life. We are committed to making your life as a manufacturer easier with flexible and high-quality solutions designed to serve you for decades. Our success is measured by your ability to enter the next era of production with confidence and ease.
Leading the industry
As a high-growth, young business, Vaski is at the forefront of global industry in bar and extrusion processing machinery, sheet metal cut-to-length and slitting machinery, as well as general industrial automation and custom machinery. Our continuous investment in research and development enables us to introduce smart features in every solution we create.
Machines
Vaski Machines
Vaski stands at the forefront of automation in flat bar processing, optimised sheet metal handling and custom machines for various industrial needs. Our mission is to create efficiency and further automate the industry.
Learn more
Applications
Read more about the applications
Understanding that each industry has unique demands, Vaski excels in providing customised solutions that cater to specific needs. Whether it's for construction, HVAC systems, or power distribution, Vaski's flexible design and manufacturing capabilities allow for bespoke solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing systems.
Learn more

From coils to strips and cut blanks, Vaski can offer a wide range of efficient solutions in blanking and slitting. From manual operated simple cut to length to fully automated systems. In particular the multi coil technologies and the automatic coil storage solutions are quite unique and supportive to this industry.
Furthermore, our bar end finishing machine has proved to be interesting to bar stockists and producers as is flexible to end finish both flat and round bar automatically with no setting adjustments required.
VaskiCOIL Series
VaskiUNICOIL for single coil need
A modular range of solutions designed for single coil blanking and slitting from coiled sheet metal. Our system ensures labour efficiency, the ultimate in automation, lights out production, and space efficiency. Experience the future of coil processing with VaskiUNICOIL.
VaskiUNICOIL Series
VaskiCOIL Series
VaskiMULTICOIL for fast material changeover
A modular range of multi-coil blanking and slitting solutions from coiled sheet metal. It offers extensive selection options, optimized production with minimal waste, and quick material changeover. Experience efficient and versatile coil processing with VaskiMULTICOIL.
VaskiMULTICOIL Series
VaskiPUNCH Series
The full automated punching with optimal workflow
One of the standout features in modern busbar processing is the implementation of all-electric, high-speed machinery. These machines not only cater to the increasing demands for energy efficiency but also maintain high reliability and production rates
VaskiPUNCH Series
VaskiSHAPE Series
The full automated punching with optimal workflow
This machine not only enhances the quality of the bar parts but also simplifies the operation process, allowing for seamless integration next to existing punching machines.
VaskiSHAPE Series
We Shape a Better Lifetime
We are the prodigies of efficiency and the designers of inspiration.Our true success lies in shaping a better lifetime for all.This is our legacy.
Read more about our sustainability
Why buying metal in coils is a smart choice for your business?
Read the story

Body Text URL_1:
Your partner for the manufacture of your press tools and your high precision mechanical components
Usinage & nouvelles technologies
Home
Company
Skills
Products
Join us
Contact
FR
EN
Our skills
Engineering department
Tooling design, a specific expertise
3D modelling (SolidWorks)
Design and realization of progressive cutting tools
Design and realization of stamping tools
Assistance in the design of eyewear components
Project management
Tools
From design to production
Design and production of press tools (cutting, stamping, folding). Design and production of progressive cutting tools for watchmaking, jewellery, or connectivity, for example. Design and realization of specific tooling for machining, polishing, assembly, welding, control...
Manufacturing of mechanical components
Assembly, adjustment
Set up on our machines
Production of pre-series on demand according to our customer’s request
Cutting / Stamping
30 years of experience in cold forming process
3 production workshops equipped with high speed automatic cutting presses, and hydraulic, pneumatic or mechanical presses from 10 to 300 t
Atelier de presses horlogères
Atelier de presses pour découpe bande de plus grandes dimensions
Atelier de découpage / matriçage / pliage à froid
Steel, stainless steel, aluminum, bronze... We work all materials whose yield strength allows this type of process...
CNC machining
The diversity of machines makes it possible to take into account a wide range of parts.
Our park is made up of about twenty machining centres :
From 3 to 7 axes
HS spindles up to 42 000 rpm
Manual or automatic loading by bar feeding system, palletizer, or robot
EDM
Precision to the nearest micron
A specific workshop mainly dedicated to the production of watch parts, or single part for tooling. This air-conditioned workshop consists of  :
wire cut EDM machines that can use wire from  Ø 0.03 up to Ø 0.25 mm
hole drilling EDM machines
die sinking EDM machines
Mass finishing
Vibrator, centrifuge, barrel, drag finishing ... many processes available according to customer needs
This workshop specifically dedicated to the mass finishing allows to carry out operations of: degreasing, cleaning, deburring, descaling, shelving, deoxidation, shining or polishing parts.
Depending on the needs of abrasion and the materials to be treated (brass, nickel silver, steel, stainless steel, titanium, aluminum, bronze, niclafor, or plastic), we use different materials for finishing operations: plastic cones, porcelain, organic material, ceramic, copper...
Marking / Welding / Assembly
Delivery of complete subassemblies
As needed, we can perform laser marking, HF welding or assembly operations and deliver complete subassemblies to our customers.
Metrology
Three-dimensional machine, camera controls, profile projectors
High-performance control means enable us to ensure a very high level of quality to meet our customers' requirements.
As needed, we can provide frequency control or 100% control of components.
The complete satisfaction of our customers and the well-being of our employees are essential issues for our company
Contact
UNT France
UNT France
Z.A. Les Buclets
13, rue des Côtes
39400 Morbier - France
Contact us
+33(0)3 84 33 08 51
Follow us

Body Text URL_4:
Your partner for the manufacture of your press tools and your high precision mechanical components
Usinage & nouvelles technologies
Home
Company
Skills
Products
Join us
Contact
FR
EN
Company
Founded in 1989 in the Jura mountains to meet the tooling needs in the field of eyewear industry (cutting, stamping, folding tools), UNT has evolved into a subcontracting activity in mechanics and precision mechanics.
Policy
A dynamic business policy based :
On a priority objective of customer satisfaction.
On a skilled, trained, and involved workforce.
On a recent machine park and regular investments that allow us to offer our customers the latest technological developments in the market.
On an effective organization aimed at reducing production cycles.
On a strong environmental commitment linked to our location in the Upper-Jura National Park.
Activity
UNT company was created in 1989 in Morbier in Upper-Jura, a region renowned for its micro technical culture.
The company has always remained faithful to its initial activity by offering its customers the design and manufacture of precision tools for stamping and simple or progressive cutting of their parts. These tools are mainly intended for the eyewear and watch industry sector and meet particularly high quality requirements.
With its production equipment, UNT also offers the manufacture of metal components in small, medium or large series. While watchmaking and eyewear remain the favoured sectors of activity, the company has diversified by offering its services in the luxury and medical industries, among others.
UNT has an integrated engineering department, and masters several technologies: CNC Machining, EDM, Die Cutting / Stamping on presses, and mass finishing.
In June 2023, UNT became part of Kering Eyewear, which belongs to the global luxury group Kering
Machines
A complete and versatile machine park :
A CNC machining workshop equipped with about twenty machining centers from 3 to 7 axes.
Three press workshops equipped with high speed automatic cutting presses and about fifteen hydraulic, pneumatic or mechanical presses from 10 to 300 t.
An EDM workshop equipped with 7 wire cut machines, as well as 3 die sinking machines and 3 hole drilling machines
A mass finishing workshop for cleaning, deburring, or polishing operations.
Quality
Since January 2018, UNT is certified ISO 9001 V 2015.
This certification reflects the company's desire to strive for operational excellence while ensuring the full satisfaction of its customers.
Contact
UNT France
UNT France
Z.A. Les Buclets
13, rue des Côtes
39400 Morbier - France

+33(0)3 84 33 08 51

Depending on the needs of abrasion and the materials to be treated (brass, nickel silver, steel, stainless steel, titanium, aluminum, bronze, niclafor, or plastic), we use different materials for finishing operations: plastic cones, porcelain, organic material, ceramic, copper...
Marking / Welding / Assembly
Delivery of complete subassemblies
As needed, we can perform laser marking, HF welding or assembly operations and deliver complete subassemblies to our customers.
Metrology
Three-dimensional machine, camera controls, profile projectors
High-performance control means enable us to ensure a very high level of quality to meet our customers' requirements.
As needed, we can provide frequency control or 100% control of components.
The complete satisfaction of our customers and the well-being of our employees are essential issues for our company

Name: Sepro Group
Description:
Founded in 1973, SEPRO was one of the first companies in the world to develop Cartesian CNC robots for injection molding machines. 
Today, SEPRO is the leading independent manufacturer of Cartesian robots in Europe for automating injection molding machines, No. 1 in the European and North American markets and No. 2 worldwide. 

Based in La Roche sur Yon (France), the company is present in 50 countries around the world with a network of 11 subsidiaries or direct offices and is represented by a network of 40 exclusive distributors. 
Sepro employs 650 people of 24 different nationalities, 80 of which in their foreign subsidiaries. 
Sepro works with the big names in the automotive, multimedia and packaging industries and has equipped more than 40,000 injection molding machines worldwide.


-	Sepro equips all kinds of injection molding machines, new or existing machines of all sizes and all brands.
-	3-axis robots, 5-axis robots and 6-axis robots controlled by the same VISUAL control system.
-	Automation: insert placing, IML, overmolding, complex stacking applications
-	Service: Spare parts, maintenance and training.

Home page
Smart Automation Systems
Smart Automation Systems
Contact us
Robotic Automation Offers Solutions to Today’s Difficult Plastics-Processing ChallengesAs an injection molder, you face more serious challenges to success today than at any time in recent memory. You endure heightened pressure to increase production levels while struggling to find and keep workers with the necessary technical knowledge and experience. Even non-skilled workers are in short supply. Plant-floor space limitations and supply-chain constraints make it difficult and/or expensive to increase production capacity, and profitability objectives demand increased quality and efficiency.Fortunately, Sepro Group, a leader in injection-molding automation for 50 years, offers a whole range of solutions, including complete, integrated manufacturing cells that can include more than one molding machine, plus peripheral components that add value to the parts you produce.
Centralized data & modular architecture to maximize performance.This cell is a demonstration of Smart Automation Systems, a modular and scalable solution for your process integration, downstream your IMM to the AMR.
Production: sailing boats
IMM: Milacron 110T
Robots: NEW 5X-15 and 6X140.2
Cycle time: 4.5 sec
Mold: 1 cavity
Controller: Visual 2 with Robot Control Integration in the IMMAll equipments from the IMM, robots and peripherals, are controlled by the new centralized Sepro’s controller : Visual+.This allows real-time Data Acquisition of your whole process into one unique Dashboard for complete traceability and all OEE indicators fr your downstream operations
Smart Automation Systems maximizes the performance and integration of your moulding process.​Based on a modular architecture and centralized Sepro controller:​Links to the Press and coordinates complex movements of Robots and all Peripherals. ​
Optimized process development, production quality and traceability thanks to relevant KPI and data analysis thanks to its connectivity.​
Unique central HMI for a better user operation experience​
Each peripheric considered as an HW/SW module with its defined inputs/outputs interface​
Reduced footprint with a single cabinet​.​Smart Automation Systems: the intelligent automation of your downstream press operations around a single central controller, for optimum efficiency of your production tool.​
Cell 3 - Step by stepCell 3 is producing Sailing Boats with following phases : ​
The Milacron press is molding the boat in 2 separate parts : the hull and the sail. Sepro and Milacron logos are molded on the sail.​
Cartesian robot 5X15 takes the 2 parts out of the press (Y-free mode). ​
6X140.2 robot takes the hull in the 5X gripper, and then the 2 robots are working together to assembly the boat (sail is putted in the hull).​
6X robot takes the assembled boat kept by the 5X and then pass over inkjet marking, printing QR Code on the fly, allowing to connect to a cloud server where Production Data of each boat are stored.​
6X presents Boat in front of a Station equipped with 2 Pneumatic Probes to get the height of the boat. This data is stored on the Cloud for production traceability.​
6X places the boat in the Tray to fill it.​
Once Tray is full, and if e-Cobot AMR is present, Parts Tray is pushed by 6X on the AMR.​
Once Tray is present on AMR, it goes on a mission to Stand to distribute Boats. Mass measured by Scale on the AMR allows to determine if the tray is empty or not, to go back in the Machine.​
When empty Tray is back on the AMR, 6X picks it up and places it on stack of empty trays on bottom Conveyor. Once loading Station is empty, 6X picks up an empty tray from stack on the bottom conveyor​.
Special cases : if the AMR is coming back with remaining pieces on Tray, or if Tray is full of boat without presence of the AMR to evacuate it (relieving this loading workstation), these Tray can be respectively taken and putted on the top conveyor, in order to evacuate these Tray and distribute the boats.

The information collected by SEPRO ROBOTIQUE is processed electronically in order to set up commercial relations between you and SEPRO ROBOTIQUE's Sales Department. Your data will be kept for the time necessary to process your requests. Pursuant to the French Data Protection Act of 6 January 1978, as amended, and the GDPR, you have the right to access, query, limit, transfer, modify, correct, and erase your personal data. You may also object at any time to the processing of your personal data. You can exercise these rights by sending us an e-mail to the following address: dataprotection@sepro-group.com or by writing to SEPRO ROBOTIQUE SAS, Henry Bessemer Street, ZI Acti-Est, CS 10084, 85003 La Roche Sur Yon, and including a copy of their signed identity document.

Contact us
Contact us
Home page
Automation
Solutions By Sepro
Solutions By Sepro
Your expert in plastic injection molding processes
Contact us
Solutions By Sepro : smart & modular solutions for the automation of injection molding machines and downstream operations.We offer all the requirements to automate your plastic injection molding machines and to create more value to the parts you are producing. With solutions ranging from turnkey to tailor-made solutions, reliable robot technologies, guarding, EOATs, peripherals all integrated in one cell.Solutions By Sepro is designed to provide everything that you need to automate you production line.Our experts work with you to provide a solution specifically designed to fit your application depending on the IMMs size, the technology involved, the available space and cycle times.Whatever your needs are, Sepro Group will accompany you every step of the way, providing support and expertize as we work to optimize your production tools with reliable technology.
A wide range of automation systemsEOAT for parts
EOAT for inserts
Over-molding stations
Conveying systems
Universal staking cells
Safety guarding
Specific stations : cavity separators and sprue cutting, control, transfer, traceability and assembly
Complete turnkey automation solutions
Download the leaflet
Solution by Sepro: Demonstration with a Cobot
This molding cell presented during K2019 includes a Sepro - Universal Robots cobot together with a Sepro Success 11 Cartesian robot operating on a molding machine from Haitian International that is producing drinking cups using a mold supplied by French mold maker SIMON. As the cups are molded, visitors watching the demonstration can enter a brief message (a name, for instance) to be printed onto a label using a system provided BluhmWeber Group. The cobot then applies the label and hands the personalized cup to the visitor. In keeping with the K fair’s “Circular Economy” theme, the label and the cup are recyclable.
Simple to complex automations, with Sepro
Simple automation
With over twenty years of experience and expertise as well as a wide range of proven and competitive automation solutions, Sepro is your natural partner for your simple automation needs.

Visual Dashboard
Visual Dashboard is a ‘smart data’ solution that harnesses the power of Sepro’s Visual robot control to collect real-time production data from an IMM served by a Sepro robot.
