Read our privacy policy
Send
The information collected by SEPRO ROBOTIQUE is processed electronically in order to set up commercial relations between you and SEPRO ROBOTIQUE's Sales Department. Data points collected via this form are required except those marked as optional. Data recipient is SEPRO ROBOTIQUE's Sales Department, the data controller. Your data will be kept for the time necessary to process your requests. Pursuant to the French Data Protection Act of 6 January 1978, as amended, and the GDPR, you have the right to access, query, limit, transfer, modify, correct, and erase your personal data. You may also object at any time to the processing of your personal data. You can exercise these rights by sending us an e-mail to the following address: dataprotection@sepro-group.com or by writing to SEPRO ROBOTIQUE SAS, Henry Bessemer Street, ZI Acti-Est, CS 10084, 85003 La Roche Sur Yon, and including a copy of their signed identity document.

Contact us

Home page
Automation
Complex automation solutions
Complex automation solutions
SOLUTION BY SEPRO, Sepro's automation brand, guarantees complex automation to increase your productivity.
Contact us
All SOLUTION BY SEPRO applications are operated by the extremely powerful and high-performance Sepro native Visual 3 control system.Comprehensive automation solutionsThese solutions are a combination of the various approved solutions in our range for turnkey cells controlled by our VISUAL 3 control system.Packaging solutionsSolutions for packaging applications are designed with our Speed Entry side-entry robots, which are high-speed Pick & Place robots for packaging parts. Their modular design allows for two types of layout and four variants for supporting payloads ranging from 10 to 50 kg. For single Pick & Place, mould intervention time is 0.45 s minimum for a total cycle time of 2.8 s minimum. We can equip IMMs up to 500 tonnes. The different configurations proposed are for picking & placing from single-plate or double-plate moulds for different types of production.IML solutionsOur range of packaging solutions with labelling was developed in cooperation with the IML systems expert, Machines Pagès. These solutions can be used for picking & placing from single-plate moulds for different types of production. By choosing IML Sepro-Machines Pagès, you are choosing an independent IML expert which can equip all brands of injection moulding machines up to 350 tonnes for affixing flat or wraparound labels to all types of parts (lids, pails, tubs, etc.). For affixing the label and picking & placing, mould intervention time is 0.9 s minimum for a total cycle time of 3.9 s minimum, depending on the type and depth of the part.Overmolding stationsWe prioritize the productivity, ergonomics and autonomy gains of your stations when choosing overmolding stations. They can be manual, semi-automatic or even automatic.

Contact us
Contact us
Home page
Markets
Automotive
Automotive
Alongside the car manufacturers and their suppliers
Contact us
Sepro has developed significant expertise in the automobile industry. The group achieves a very large share of its turnover in this industry and has prestigious customers among the industry’s global, regional, and local manufacturers, OEMs, and processors.
Simply said, Sepro has provided us with an overall good quality product with a short ROI, that has improved our process capabilities and made us more efficient.
Scott Reed
Technical Manager - Koller-Craft South
Recognized expertise in the automotive sectorOver the years, Sepro Group has developed very advanced expertise in the field of robots dedicated to the automotive sector. Sepro, which exports 85% of its production, is a recognized expert in the field of Cartesian robots automating plastic injection presses. These machines are found in large numbers in the automotive industry.The large robots developed by Sepro are particularly appreciated by our customers in the automotive sector, who demand precision and power: Strong, 7X line, S7 line. Our entire range of robots will meet all the challenges of the automotive world.
Recommended Products
7X Line
The 7X Line of 5-axis robots offers the ideal combination of Sepro new generation high-capacity 3-axis linear robots and Stäubli 2-axis digital rotation. These are precise, flexible robots capable of extracting and loading technically complex parts into the mold or IMM peripherals. Visual 3 control system
S5 Line: the ideal robot for the automotive industry
The S5 Line is designed using the best Sepro technology, to make a very well-designed range of high performance 3-axis robots.They are reliable, fast and precise and ideal for complex automotive applications.
5X Line
5X Line robots are designed from latest generation fast and precise Sepro 3-axis Cartesian robots with a Stäubli 2-axis servo wrist. A unique combination that provides a number of solutions for automating injection molding machines. These robots installed on the IMM can be used for unloading and processing parts; they can be located at the end of the IMM to perform post-processing. They can be programmed quickly and efficiently thanks to the power and user friendliness of the Visual 3 control system.
Other solutions
Automation ? Solutions by Sepro !
The Sepro Group can assist you with your automation projects. If you have already tested our Sepro robots, so let’s try Automation – Solution by Sepro !
With years of experience and expertise, Sepro offers proven, comprehensive and competitive solutions.
Maintenance contracts
Service pack contract: with this contract, you benefit from the free and priority hotline, as well as our promise to intervene on site within 24 hours in the event of a breakdown. You will also benefit from a discount on spare parts and interventions.
Modulars EOAT’s
Every day, Sepro Group designs and builds modular EOATs for its customers from components such as bars, vacuum cups, grippers and sprue-cutters.
Stay connected
I agree to be added to Sepro's mailing list, and I authorize Sepro to collect the above data. I acknowledge that I can change my preferences at any time.
Register my email to receive the newsletter
Follow us
Register your robot

Name: HEIDENHAIN FRANCE
Description:
HEIDENHAIN develops and produces linear encoders, angle encoders, rotary encoders, and CNC controls for demanding positioning tasks. Rounding out its product portfolio are touch probes, camera systems, length gauges, digital readouts, signal converters, testing devices, and inspection devices. What's more, its practical software solutions for the Digital Shop Floor empower end users to fully digitalize their manufacturing ecosystem. For more than 130 years, the company has been a standard-setting pioneer in measurement, control, and drive system technology. HEIDENHAIN products often lay the groundwork for technological advances in the most innovative global industries, including semiconductors, electronics, machine tools and production equipment automation for the factories of tomorrow. 

This is the local LinkedIn profile of HEIDENHAIN France, in Sèvres. 
More about HEIDENHAIN [company name]: www.heidenhain.xx

More strong brands for your applications:
AMO │ ACU-RITE │ ETEL │ NUMERIK JENA │ RENCO │ RSF

Commandes CNC
HEIDENHAIN propose des CNC avec une gamme complète de produits pour tous les types de machines de fraisage et de tournage courants.
Que ce soit pour une machine à CNC simple en 3 axes ou pour une machine très complexe de 23 axes, avec une CN HEIDENHAIN vous êtes toujours sûr de faire le bon choix ! Elles ont en effet pour caractéristique d'être extrêmement performantes tout en étant simples d’utilisation. À la fois pratiques, polyvalentes, performantes et faciles à mettre en service, elles vous permettront de travailler efficacement.

Digital Shop Floor Les produits logiciels de Digital Shop Floor de HEIDENHAIN sont destinés aux sites de production qui exploitent des machines-outils à CNC. Les solutions Digital Shop Floor vous assistent tout au long de votre chaîne de production, de la planification de vos ordres de fabrication au suivi et à l'analyse de votre production, en passant par le travail de préparation de la fabrication.
Besoin d'un conseil personnalisé ?
Tester StateMonitor pendant 30 jours
Télécharger l’e-book
Accueil
Produits
Solutions logiciellesDigital Shop Floor
PreviousNextSolutions logicielles
Les solutions logicielles de HEIDENHAIN reproduisent intégralement la chaîne de processus de votre production, pour digitaliser votre atelier, sans devoir en passer par le cloud, et ce quel que soit le constructeur de vos machines ou le type de commandes numériques que vous utilisez.
Nos logiciels Digital Shop Floor
Connected Machining
Avec Connected Machining, HEIDENHAIN vous propose des solutions sur-mesure pour gérer vos ordres de fabrication de manière 100 % digitale, quel que soit l'endroit où vous êtes : au pied de la machine, au bureau d'études ou encore dans la zone de préparation de l'usinage.
Votre CN HEIDENHAIN peut s'intégrer de différentes manières.HEIDENHAIN Automation Solution
Le système modulaire d'automatisation universelle des pièces et des outils offre aux utilisateurs un mode d'utilisation intuitif. Les constructeurs de machines et les spécialistes de l'automatisation s'appuient sur des composants qui ont fait leurs preuves tout en bénéficiant d'une grande flexibilité.
Voir les avantages de HEIDENHAIN Automation Solution
Nos services
Optimisez votre production de façon ciblée grâce aux analyses et aux conseils prodigués par notre service Digital Shop Floor, et restez informés des dernières actualités grâce à nos formations et webinaires. Enfin, notre service Support se tient à votre disposition pour toute question.
Voir les services Digital Shop FloorEn savoir plus sur StateMonitor

Étalonnage DAkkS conforme à la norme DIN EN ISO/IEC 17025
Laissez le laboratoire de mesure HEIDENHAIN compétent étalonner régulièrement vos systèmes de mesure linéaires et angulaires.
Accueil
Services et support
Services
Étalonnage DAkkS
Qu'est-ce qu'un étalonnage DAkkS ?
Un étalonnage DAkkS garantit à l’utilisateur un certain niveau de précision de son appareil, dans des conditions données. Le certificat d’étalonnage qui lui est remis assure la traçabilité métrologique du système de mesure, documentée par un organisme contrôlé, impartial et reconnu.REMARQUE : Selon la norme ISO 9001, pour que des résultats puissent être valables, les équipements de mesure doivent être étalonnés et vérifiés à intervalles réguliers, ou avant leur utilisation, à l’aide d’étalons de mesure dont la traçabilité est garantie par rapport à des étalons de mesure nationaux et internationaux. L’étalonnage DAkkS chez HEIDENHAIN
Le laboratoire d’étalonnage de HEIDENHAIN est accrédité depuis 1994 pour les étalonnages de codeurs linéaires et angulaires digitaux, conformément à la norme DIN ISO/CEI 17025. La société DAkkS (Deutsche Akkreditierungsstelle GmbH) est l’organisme d’accréditation allemand chargé de contrôler et de surveiller les laboratoires d’étalonnage. C’est elle qui certifie le personnel et la compétence métrologique de HEIDENHAIN. Conditions requises pour l’obtention d’un étalonnage DAkkS
Pour que les étalonnages réalisés soient conformes à la norme ISO/CEI 17025, il faut que les procédures mises en œuvre aient été vérifiées et validées. De telles procédures ont été mises au point et établies par notre laboratoire d’étalonnage pour un grand nombre de produits HEIDENHAIN (les palpeurs de mesure, par exemple), satisfaisant ainsi la plupart des besoins des clients. Si vous avez des besoins spécifiques, nous vous invitons à nous fournir une description détaillée de la tâche d’étalonnage. HEIDENHAIN en contrôle ensuite la faisabilité et vous transmet un devis concret pour un étalonnage réussi. Certificat d’étalonnage DAkkS ou certificat de contrôle du fabricant
Avec un certificat de contrôle, un fabricant fournit des informations sur les erreurs de mesure de ses systèmes de mesure. Un certificat d’étalonnage DAkkS est un document émis par un organisme neutre et indépendant, qui décrit les caractéristiques de mesure d’un système de mesure. Nous nous tenons à votre disposition pour vous conseiller sur l’étalonnage DAkkS et le certificat de contrôle du fabricant.

Le mode Closed Loop améliore la précision des pièces
Les erreurs thermiques constituent la première cause d'erreurs de positionnement, et cela est principalement dû au procédé d'usinage lui-même. Sous l'effet de la température, la dilatation ou la contraction de certains composants machine peut entraîner d'importants écarts, sans possibilité de compensation. En effet, dans des boucles d'asservissement classiques, les variations dues à la température dans la mécanique d'avance ne sont tout simplement pas visibles. Pour cette raison, un asservissement en boucle fermée (Closed Loop) des axes linéaires et rotatifs s'impose comme la solution pour obtenir des pièces unitaires et de séries extrêmement précises, avec des contours parfaits.
Accueil
Secteurs et applications
Machine-outil
Précision des machines-outilsFabrication de pièces unitaires
Pour des pièces unitaires complexes, la précision doit être garantie dès la première pièce. La précision des axes linéaires et rotatifs est déterminante pour le résultat de l'usinage, et particulièrement dans le cadre d'usinages 5 axes.
Précision dès première pièce
Fabrication de petites et moyennes séries
Lors de la fabrication de petites et moyennes séries, le programme d'usinage change fréquemment et, avec lui, la température de la vis à billes. En utilisant des codeurs linéaires en Closed Loop, vos production bénéficiera d'une précision constante.
Une précision constante
Fabrication de grandes séries
Les codeurs linéaires et angulaires améliorent la précision des centres d'usinage qui interviennent dans la chaîne de processus, assurant ainsi un niveau de qualité à la fois élevé et constant dans la production de grandes séries.
Des processus plus fiablesUtilisation de codeurs linéaires en Closed Loop pour compenser les erreurs thermiquesClosed Loop: precision, quality and tradition | HEIDENHAINCancellive00:0000:00CCSubtitles×HDQuality×1xSpeed×Le mode Closed Loop dans la fabrication de pièces unitairesL'influence de l'acquisition des positions sur la précision des usinages 5 axes
L'exemple du ballon de football Telstar met particulièrement bien en évidence les avantages qu'apporte l’acquisition des positions au moyen de codeurs linéaires et angulaires HEIDENHAIN. Pour obtenir un résultat visuellement parfait, il faut que les coutures, pentagones et hexagones qui composent ce ballon soient fraisés avec une précision constante, pendant plus deux heures. L'angle de réglage de la fraise par rapport à la pièce, tel qu'il est défini dans le programme CN, entraîne de très grands mouvements des axes linéaires et rotatifs, imposant de fait une haute précision dans l'espace.

Téléchargements
Information technique : La précision des axes d'avance
Information technique : De parfaits états de surface grâce aux codeurs HEIDENHAIN
Information technique : Un fraisage rapide et précis pour un excellent état de surfaceMode Semi-closed Loop
La mécanique d'entraînement influence négativement la précision de l'usinage. La largeur de la couture varie et on peut voir que les coutures ne sont pas nettes.
Mode Closed Loop
Grâce aux codeurs linéaires et angulaires de précision HEIDENHAIN utilisés, la mécanique d'entraînement n'influence pas le résultat de l'usinage. La couture est fraisée à la bonne largeur, avec des transitions parfaites.Le mode Closed Loop dans la fabrication de petites et moyennes sériesUne précision constante pour les petites et moyennes séries
La précision d'une machine-outil dépend fortement de sa capacité à faire face aux variations rapides de ses conditions d'utilisation. Le passage d'une opération d'ébauche à une opération de finition fait fortement varier les charges mécaniques et thermiques que subit la machine, ce qui peut nuire considérablement à la précision. De telles variations de l'état de charge s'observent lors de l'usinage de petits lots de pièces. Le fait de passer sans arrêt d'une opération de dégauchissage à l'usinage de pièces spécifiques génère des chaleurs variables qui influencent négativement la précision.
Informations complémentaires
Livre blanc
Téléchargements
Article Klartext : Un usinage toujours précis quoi qu'il arriveMode Semi-closed Loop
Variation thermique des axes d'avance
Closed Loop
Pas de variation thermique des axes d'avanceLe mode Closed Loop dans la fabrication de grandes sériesUne meilleure précision des centres d'usinage lors de la production automatisée de grandes séries
Dans l'industrie automobile, la production de grandes séries est en train de connaître un tournant. Ainsi par exemple, les lignes de transfert rigides pour les composants des chaînes cinématiques des véhicules ont été peu à peu remplacées par des centres d'usinage en chaîne, pour une meilleure flexibilité d'usinage.Les tolérances d'une pièce finie dépendent des différents types de machines et processus d'usinage utilisés sur l'ensemble de la chaîne de fabrication. Utilisés en Closed Loop, les codeurs linéaires contribuent à une amélioration de la précision d'usinage, et donc des réserves de tolérance, qui peuvent alors être exploitées autrement, par exemple en prolongeant la durée d'utilisation des outils.

Les solutions HEIDENHAIN pour vos applications spécifiquesLeaders en technique de mesure, de commande et d'entraînement, HEIDENHAIN et les marques AMO, ETEL, IMT, LTN, NUMERIK JENA, RENCO et RSF créent, grâce à leurs produits, les conditions nécessaires aux avancées technologiques des secteurs les plus innovants du monde. Quel que soit votre secteur – machine-outil, automatisme, semi-conducteurs, électronique, métrologie, robotique, matériel médical, systèmes de transmission, ascenseurs, impression, contrôle de santé des structures (SHM) ou télescopes – le développement continu de nos produits en termes de précision, de dynamique et de fiabilité de processus améliore directement la performance et l'efficacité de vos machines, installations, appareils et processus. Découvrez les solutions que nous proposons pour votre secteur et comment celles-ci peuvent optimiser vos applications.Besoin d'un conseil personnalisé ?
Accueil
Secteurs et applications
Nos solutions pour votre secteur et votre application
Machine-outil
Les systèmes de mesure linéaire et les système de mesure angulaire pour l’asservissement Closed Loop des axes ainsi que les commandes numériques HEIDENHAIN définissent, dans le secteur de la machine-outil, les standards de précision, de volume de copeaux, de sécurité de processus et de convivialité.
Solutions pour la machine-outil
Automatisation
La précision et la dynamique des processus de fabrication automatisés dépendent pour beaucoup des propriétés des systèmes de mesure utilisés – quel que soit le secteur partiel, de la robotique à la métrologie, que vous prenez en considération.
Solutions pour l’automatisation
Électronique
Les progrès faits dans l’industrie des semi-conducteurs et l’industrie électronique sont essentiellement dûs à la miniaturisation permanente des composants front-end et back-end. Nous mettons tout en œuvre pour faire évoluer la technique de mesure et de positionnement.
Solutions haut de gamme pour l'électroniqueRobotique
Les robots s'acquittent de tâches de plus en plus complexes, p. ex. en réalisant des usinages de précision ou en collaborant avec l’homme. Pour le feedback moteur et le positionnement, nous avons les solutions qu’il vous faut – aussi bien dans le secteur de la robotique classique que de la robotique avancée.
Solutions pour la robotique
Technologie médicale
Les applications sont hyper-sensibles et extrêmement polyvalentes dans le domaine de la technologie médicale. Face à cela, nos systèmes de mesure offrent la précision requise et un maximum de sécurité. Nos commandes garantissent des implants parfaitement usinés à partir d’une taille de lot 1.
Solutions pour la technologie médicale
Moteurs
Systèmes de mesure pour le feedback moteur, asservissement de position, commande de positionnement ou moteurs les plus divers, vous trouverez chez nous des solutions d'une précision, d'une performance et d'une dynamique exceptionnelles.
Solutions pour la technique d’entraînementTechnologie des ascenseurs
Qu’ils soient installés au plus près du moteur, des freins, de la cage ou des portes d’ascenseurs, nos codeurs sont là pour vous garantir confort et sécurité. En parallèle, nous réfléchissons d’ores et déjà à des solutions innovantes pour les ascenseurs du futur.
Solutions pour ascenseurs
Contrôle de santé des structures (SHM)
Protégez vos bâtiments et installations industrielles les plus sollicités en les dotant de capteurs numériques ! En mesurant les dilatations, vibrations et oscillations, vous obtiendrez des données pertinentes sur lesquelles vous appuyer pour optimiser l’état et le fonctionnement de vos installations.
Solutions pour le contrôle de santé des structures
Énergie éolienne
Codeurs et capteurs peuvent vous aider à maximiser le rendement et la disponibilité de vos éoliennes. Spécialement conçus pour satisfaire les exigences requises dans l’éolien, ces dispositifs vous permettront de collecter des données très précises sur chaque composant, afin de gagner en efficience.
Solutions pour éoliennesMachines d'impression
Malgré toute la numérisation, le papier imprimé fait partie intégrante de notre quotidien. Aussi, vous trouverez chez nous des systèmes de mesure pour vos systèmes et machines, de l'imprimante laser compacte à l'imprimante rotative, du prépresse au système de traitement ultérieur.
Solutions pour la technologie d’impression

Optimisation de la précision de votre machine
Les tolérances appliquées aux pièces usinées, et donc au niveau de précision des machines-outils, sont de plus en plus strictes. Les résultats d’usinages, notamment en ce qui concerne la précision et la qualité des états de surface, sont fortement influencés par la précision dynamique et statique de l’asservissement des machines. Les composants de la machine-outil sont toutefois forcément source d’erreurs : résultat du processus d’usinage, du montage ou bien d’une déformation élastique.Ainsi, quel que soit le type de travaux où la précision a son importance, il est important de pouvoir déterminer les éventuels écarts et les compenser le cas échéant.
Nous vous vous proposons pour cela plusieurs manières d’améliorer la qualité de votre machine.
Accueil
Services et support
Services
Optimisation des machines
Dynamic Precision – pour un usinage dynamique de haute précision
Les fonctions de Dynamic Precision vous sont proposées comme options pour les CN HEIDENHAIN. Elles peuvent être utilisées, soit de manière individuelle, soit de manière combinée.CTC : compensation des écarts de position en fonction de l’accélération au niveau du TCP (Tool Center Point) permettant d’améliorer la précision en phases d’accélérationAVD : atténuation active des vibrations pour de meilleures surfacesPAC : adaptation des paramètres d’asservissement en fonction de la positionLAC : adaptation des paramètres d’asservissement en fonction de la charge, améliorant ainsi la précision indépendamment de la charge et du vieillissementMAC : adaptation des paramètres d’asservissement en fonction des mouvements
Télécharger le flyerDynamic Precision: dampen vibrations with MVCCancellive00:0000:001xSpeed×HDQuality×CCSubtitles×KinematicsOpt
Cette option correspond à un cycle intégré à la TNC qui permet d’effectuer un contrôle rapide et efficace de la cinématique de la machine, et de l’optimiser. Elle assiste également l’opérateur dans la recherche d’erreurs statiques sur la machine, sans pouvoir les compenser pour autant.
En savoir plus
KinematicsComp
KinematicsComp améliore nettement la précision d’usinage et le respect des contours. Sur des machines de grandes dimensions, plus les courses de déplacement sont longues et le poids des pièces important, plus les erreurs générées seront importantes. Comme il est difficile de remédier à ce type de phénomènes d’un point de vue mécanique, KinematicsComp vous donne un avantage concurrentiel non négligeable. Sur des machines de plus petites dimensions, la précision est de mise. Là encore, KinematicsComp permet d’atteindre de nettes améliorations. Compensation volumétrique
La compensation volumétrique permet de déterminer les écarts volumétriques dans toute la zone d’usinage, qu’il s’agisse de machines récentes ou plus anciennes, équipées d’une CN HEIDENHAIN. Plusieurs méthodes de mesure sont disponibles, selon vos besoins. Par exemple, un traceur laser peut être utilisé pour mesurer plusieurs fois le même point depuis différentes positions et générer un modèle d’erreur avec des fichiers de compensation. Cela permet de limiter les erreurs géométriques statiques et d’améliorer le positionnement au niveau du TCP dans l’ensemble du volume. Il s’agit là d’une prestation de services proposée par le service après-vente de HEIDENHAIN.

Name: MECANUMERIC
Description:
MECANUMERIC GROUP offers a new generation of CNC machines acclaimed by the industrial world, the dental community and education.
 
Its position is widely recognized in the following markets: rapid prototyping, signs, modeling, models and design, various 3D machining and engraving. The partnership developed with each customer allows the implementation of leading integrated solutions, ensuring flexibility and productivity.
 
Technologic and " high performance " service, proximity and reliability are the guarantees offered by the MECANUMERIC GROUP, one of the few manufacturers in the world to master all the technologies required to design, manufacture, installation, as well as maintenance of complete and individualized solutions for CNC cutting by HSM milling but also other methods such as water jet, laser and ultrasonic.
 
3 departements : one ultimate goal

INDUSTRY
Multiple solutions dedicated to the professionals, combining flexibility and competitiveness of the purchasing and operating costs.

DENTAL
A complete, open, integrated and 100% French offer. Designed for an intensive daily production of the production centres.

EDUCATION
A wide range of equipments suitable for the pedagogical needs of the technical high schools, professional and higher education.

MECANUMERIC chose to integrate its own design office and production plant. It's an ambitious choice that now enables the company to offer a range of standard CNC cutting machines, as well as responding to very specific specifications by adapting its standard range or developing a new custom CNC cutting machine from scratch to make it totally bespoke for the customer.
The Charlyrobot compact cutting machines brand, initially dedicated to the world of education and training, and the CharlyDENTAL range, which became MECANUMERIC's "dental division", have been merged with MECANUMERIC since 2014 and complete its integrated, 100% French offering, a real concentrate of technology and a reflection of expertise in the design and production of numerically controlled industrial equipment.

Name: CNC24
Description:
CNC24 is your partner for all metal and plastic components. Your advantages at a glance: 

 Order machine parts easily & quickly online
 Global Network with over 500 Suppliers from 22 Countries
 Fast & reliable delivery times
 Quality standards at the highest level (according to ISO9001)

Our own measurement center for quality assurance and a well-established global supplier network makes CNC24 the competent partner for CNC turning, milling and sheet metal manufacturing. From prototypes, single parts, small series to large series - all work is carried out with the highest precision, based on 30 years of manufacturing experience.

We strive to offer an unrivaled level of customer service. Benefit from our expert advice and transparent, fully digital processes. CNC24 is your hub to the world of manufacturing.

Quality you can count onThis is how quality management works at CNC24Clearly defined processesQuality management in CNC24 measuring centerCNC24 stands not only for attractive prices and timely delivery, but also for excellent quality in all components.Our global network consists of over 500 manufacturers from 21 countries. In order to ensure consistent quality, we rely on a strict selection process for our manufacturers, a continuous evaluation of suppliers, as well as an additional quality control in our in-house measuring center.Quality assurance according to ISO 9001:2015 in our own measurement center:– Proof of inspection with every order– Lowest rejection rate on the marketThis guarantees quality like Made in Germany, regardless of the country of manufacture.Double holds betterQuality control by manufacturer and CNC24At CNC24 all orders are double checked. Our producers carry out regular quality control as part of the manufacturing process. In addition, we measure all components in our in-house measuring center in Berlin.Double quality control ensures that you only receive components within the required tolerances.What you can expectOur quality promise!ISO 9001:2015 certified quality managementOwn measurement center at the Berlin siteEvery order including free test certificateDouble quality assurance by suppliers and CNC24Global production with German qualityLowest rejection rate on the marketConsistently high quality with every order9 out of 10 customers recommend CNC24Guaranteed qualityOur measuring center: facts and figuresIn our modern measuring center we perform quality control for all orders. Here we measure your components to ensure that all requirements regarding shape, fit, position and surface finish are met.Only the most modern measuring equipment, the latest coordinate measuring machines and contour measuring devices are used. Thanks to efficient processes, components pass through our quality assurance in less than 24 hours.Through our rigorous quality management, we achieve a complaint rate of less than 0.17% on all components.Components with satisfaction guaranteeThe CNC24 Quality Management Process1Production and control at the supplier2Measurement of the components in the CNC24 measuring center3Shipping of the released componentsDo you need certificatesDo you need a measurement report or initial sample test report?Our colleagues in the quality control department prepare a free test certificate for each order. On request, we can prepare additional measurement reports, material test certificates or initial sample test reports (ISTR). Please let us know at the time of your inquiry if you need a special certificate or proof so that we can process your order without delays.CNC24The easiest way to order componentsGet a quote now

Get a QuoteMachining with the highest precisionPrecision partsRequest & order online.CNC24 is your partner for precision components in all machining and non-cutting production processes. Simply order your components online. Fast service with attractive prices. You will receive a free inspection certificate with every order.Get a quote now1.000Satisfied customers5.500Available machines0,11%Complaint ratePrecision parts from CNC24 – Quality is a matter of trustThe production of CNC precision parts is a matter for specialists who are committed to the highest possible quality. For us, quality is not only what our customers want.  It is also our mission. Our ambition is to always exceed our customers’ expectations. We know how important the adherence to tolerances, surface finishes and all other specifications is necessary for the success of a production.  Therefore, trust us, our competence and our experience around precision parts to also lead your project to success.CNC24 – Your specialist for the production of complex CNC precision partsCNC means being able to produce almost any shaped workpiece in any quantity with modern machinery. Consistent quality, strictly in accordance with our customers’ specifications, is our mission.With a company policy focused on quality and service, we have been able to delight every one of our customers so far. Through the successful processing of many orders, we have been able to gain experience that equips us for any challenge in the future.We offer modern automatic lathes and milling machines with which we can produce your precision parts in any contour. Our machinery is always state of the art. This allows us to move into ever narrower areas of tolerance.This already makes us a top precision parts supplier for the particularly demanding sectors of the automotive industry, special machine construction, aerospace, and medical technology.Get a quote for your partsWe will send you a suitable offer within 48 hoursGet a quote nowPerfect components in just 3 steps!1Make a requestUpload production drawing and specify order. You will receive your offer within 48 hours.2Quality controlWe find the right paver, supervise production and take care of quality control in our in-house measuring center.3Components receivedYou receive your quality-tested components including detailed test certificate.Here’s howWhy CNC24Your advantagesFlexible and free capacities at any timeAttractive prices for all componentsQuality control according to ISO 9001:2015One contract and contact person for all manufacturing processesDigital processes with personal contact personGlobal Supply Chain with German Quality Standards 🇩🇪You have the choiceOur delivery timesOffer within 48 hoursStandard production in 15-20 working daysExpress service in 6-12 working daysGet a quote for your partsWe will send you a suitable offer within 48 hoursGet a quote nowYour advantagesHighest quality standards & service orientation for your precision partsCould we make you curious? Then describe your concern about your precision parts to us using our contact form. The more precisely you formulate your project, the more accurately we can prepare a preliminary offer for you.Only a short time passes from your inquiry to the preparation of a quotation. Service and transparency are our top priorities. We will discuss the details for your precision parts together in a follow-up meeting until all questions have been clarified.Our company is fit for the requirements of Industry 4.0. Send us your plans digitally and let us inspire you with our performance. We are only satisfied when we have won you over – and preferably permanently.Material selectionWhich components and materials can be machined?Our machinery and engineering covers the entire spectrum of materials commonly used in mechanical engineering. These include: Steel, stainless steel, aluminum, copper, brass, various alloys and all types of plastics.In addition to manufacturing from semi-finished products and blanks, we are also happy to accept finished products for further material processing. If your own machinery could not achieve the desired tolerance of the precision parts, come to us.With high-precision surface processing, we bring every product to the desired size.What we produceSample componentsSurface treatmentWe get the best out of your componentsRefinement, appearance, protection against wear and corrosion prophylaxis of the turned components are as much part of our core business as the production of components.SandblastingPaintAnodizingPowder coatingElectroless nickelGalvanizingPassivateChromateAll surface processesYour partner for all componentsOther manufacturing processesTurningMillingSheet metalLaser cuttingBendingInjection moldingDie casting3D printingAll manufacturing processesFAQImportant questionsHow is your precision parts manufactured?Download your production drawing incl. 3D model (CAD drawing) and specify your request. Within 48 hours you will receive a suitable offer for your components.  Describe your request to us, even for complicated inquiries. We turn, mill, drill, grind, finish and polish until your workpiece is exactly as you need it. We guarantee this for prototypes and small series as well as for mass orders.Trust our competence and our experience. With CNC Teile 24 you have found the service provider for your demanding challenges.What manufacturing methods does CNC24 offer?As a full-service provider, CNC24 offers all modern CNC manufacturing methods supplemented by sheet metal processing and additive manufacturing in 3D printing as well as injection molding and die casting from a single source.Our manufacturing methods for precision components – Turning– Milling– Sheet metal working (bending, punching, water jet cutting, laser cutting)– 3D printing (metal and plastic)– Injection molding– Die castingWhen things have to move fast: CNC precision parts by expressA service provider lets them down, the machine breaks down or important employees become ill – production can already come to a standstill. The consequences are delivery delays, penalties and, in the worst case, the loss of the customer. Don’t let it get to that point. With us on your side, you will get your products in the desired quality even if it has to happen very quickly. Our production is always oriented for emergencies and special works. Therefore, rely on our CNC Express Service with a delivery time from 72 hours – For sheet metal parts, milled parts and turned parts. You will be thrilled.Have more questions?Contact UsCNC24 is the leading portal for CNC manufacturing in EuropeCNC24 simplifies the procurement of CNC turned and milled parts.CNC24 is your specialist and contact for prototypes, single parts, small series as well as for higher quantities. Our know-how in CNC turning and CNC milling, our own experience in manufacturing, a Europe-wide network of partners and the CNC24 quality management according to DIN EN ISO 9001:2015 make us your competent partner.CNC24The easiest way to order componentsGet a quote now

Get a QuoteWe process any metalMetalworking by CNC24Your request in a few minuteOffer within 48 hoursAttractive prices and highest quality standardsRequest quote now1.000Satisfied customers5.500Available machines0,11%Complaint rateReliable metalworking with consistent qualityWe at CNC24 are professional service providers in metal processing. We provide you with the entire range of machining processes from a single source. In addition to the standard machining and joining processes, we also offer a comprehensive range of surface treatment options. Take advantage of our competence, our experience and our modern machinery. With our services, you remain a supplier and delight your customers with components of consistent, excellent quality.Why CNC24Your advantagesFlexible and free capacities at any timeAttractive prices for all componentsQuality control according to ISO 9001:2015One contract and contact person for all manufacturing processesDigital processes with personal contact personGlobal Supply Chain with German Quality Standards 🇩🇪You have the choiceOur delivery timesOffer within 48 hoursStandard production in 15-20 working daysExpress service in 6-12 working daysGet a quote for your partsWe will send you a suitable offer within 48 hoursGet a quote nowProcesses in metal processingWe at CNC24 offer the full range of machining processes for metals. This includes the CNC-based processes. But our offer goes far beyond that. We manufacture your components in the following processes:MachiningSeparateFormingJoiningSurface treatmentChange of material propertiesWith machining, our modern machinery is ready for you around the CNC machining of your metal products. Turning, drilling, grinding and milling is implemented by us precisely according to your specifications and in consistent quality. We also refine bores by threading, reaming or countersinking. Whether precision parts as individual pieces or entire assemblies, we are your service provider for the manufacture of products for mechanical engineering and all other industries.We offer different hot and cold cutting processes to optimally process your sheet metal. Our CNC-controlled laser and waterjet cutting systems cut your sheets with high precision, in any geometry and within any desired tolerance. In terms of forming processes, we can offer bending and round bending, folding, rolling, folding and forging to process metal. If you need more forming processes, call us. In any case, we will find a solution to your challenges.With soldering, welding and press-fitting, conventional joining processes are available for your tasks. As a full-size service provider, we are also proficient in welding non-ferrous metals and aluminum. For surface treatment, we have various coating processes such as painting, powder coating or electroplating in our program. In addition, with anodizing and burnishing, we also master particularly demanding processes in surface treatment. Using annealing furnaces, oil baths or other processes, we can change the material properties of your metal products. By hardening or tempering, we optimize your components to meet your exact challenges.Your partner for all componentsOther manufacturing processesTurningMillingSheet metalLaser cuttingBendingInjection moldingDie casting3D printingAll manufacturing processesYour advantagesMetalworking with precisionWe at CNC24 offer you the comprehensively competent machining of your workpieces. No matter how complex your tasks, we rise to any challenge in contract work. Whether you just need a light rework of your products or you want us to manufacture complete assemblies for you, give us a call.Our expertise goes beyond metalworking. If you have tasks related to plastics or special materials, please contact us. Together we will find the ideal solution to your challenge, no matter how demanding.Surface processingMetalworking with CNC24We at CNC24 offer you comprehensive machining options for your metal products. For this we have a global network with over 500 reliable contract manufacturers.With this concentrated competence, the implementation of your tasks is always guaranteed. Use our online form to send us your drawing or product description. You will receive an offer within a few days. In a personal conversation we agree together on the further procedure.This way you can get your products as quickly as possible and meet your deadlines.CNC24 is the leading portal for metalworking in EuropeCNC24 simplifies the procurement of CNC turned and milled parts.CNC24 is your specialist and contact for prototypes, single parts, small series as well as for higher quantities. Our know-how in CNC turning and CNC milling, our own experience in manufacturing, a Europe-wide network of partners and the CNC24 quality management according to DIN EN ISO 9001:2015 make us your competent partner.CNC24The easiest way to order componentsGet a quote now

Name: Ernst Knoll Feinmechanik GmbH
Description: Established as a family business over 60 years ago, KNOLL Feinmechanik is a recognised specialist for automation solutions in the manufacturing of medical articles as well as for industrial assembly processes where the highest precision is required.

    "bodyText": "Skip to content\nErnst Knoll Feinmechanik - Ihr Partner für intelligente Automatisierung\nAutomatisierungTechnische Beratung\nEntwicklung & Konstruktion\nSoftware & Visualisierung\nMontage & Inbetriebnahme\nAfter-Sales & ServiceTechnologienRobotik & Greifersysteme\nModulbaukasten\nSchlauchhandhabung\nFülltechnik\nZuführtechnik\nVerbindungs- & Trenntechnologien\nDichtigkeitsprüfung\nVision – KamerasystemeFertigungSpanende Fertigung\nWasserstrahlschneiden\nRapid Prototyping\nSchaltschrankbau\nSerienproduktionProjekte\nUnternehmen\nKarriereAusbildung\nStudierende\nArbeitsplätze\nSocial BenefitsNews\nANFRAGEN / KONTAKT\nKNOLL Feinmechanik\nIhr Partner für   intelligente Automatisierung\nErnst Knoll Feinmechanik GmbH\tAutomatisierung in höchster Präzision\tWir entwickeln und produzieren individuell zugeschnittene Automatisierungslösungen. Alle wichtigen und Know-how relevanten Systemelemente werden traditionell vor Ort in Umkirch selbst gefertigt und schlüsselfertig ausgeliefert. So garantieren wir Präzision und Kontrolle bis ins kleinste Detail.\nGemeinsam konstruieren wir passgenaue Lösungen, die höchsten Ansprüchen gerecht werden. In jeder Projektphase binden wir Sie als Kunden in einen offenen und konstruktiven Austausch mit unseren spezialisierten Teams ein.\nUnser Augenmerk liegt auf effizienten und zukunftsfähigen Prozessen, von denen Sie und Ihr Unternehmen profitieren.\n*Alle internen Abteilungen Konstruktion & Entwicklung, mechanische Fertigung, Schaltschrankbau, Wasserstrahlschneiden und Rapid Prototyping stehen auch einzeln für externe Aufträge zur Verfügung.\nSeit über\t0\nJahren\nin Familienbesitz\nEine Mannschaft von der Entwicklung bis zur Inbetriebnahme\tIntelligente Lösungen in konzentriertem Teamwork\tDank unseres hohen Eigenfertigungsanteils können wir flexible und hochwertige Anlagenprodukte garantieren.\nDafür arbeiten unsere hoch qualifizierten Facharbeiter, Techniker und Ingenieure daran, Ihnen kundenspezifische Lösungen zu bieten.\nTechnische Beratung\nMehr lesen\nEntwicklung & Konstruktion\nMehr lesen\nSoftware & Visualisierung\nMehr lesen\nFertigung & Produktion\nMehr ANFRAGEN / KONTAKT
Fertigung & Produktion
Fertigung	Multifunktionaler Maschinenpark	Wir sind Experten in den Bereichen Spanende Fertigung, Wasserstrahlschneiden, Rapid Prototyping und 3D-Druck. In unserem Schaltschrankbau erfüllen wir die aktuellsten Anforderungen und arbeiten ausschließlich mit qualifizierten Elektrofachkräften.
Die gesamte Produktion verfügt über die modernsten Maschinen und Technologien, welche für die eigene Teilefertigung und auch für externe Aufträge zur Verfügung stehen. Alle Bereiche werden für Einzel- und Serienfertigungen je nach Bedarf und Wirtschaftlichkeit eingesetzt.
Individuelle Möglichkeiten	Komplette Fertigung aus einer Hand	Bei uns erhalten Sie zuverlässig alles aus einer Hand. Viele Schlüsselbauteile für unsere Automatisierungslösungen werden Inhouse mit unserem multifunktionalen Maschinenpark produziert. Auf Basis langjähriger Erfahrung wählen wir die jeweils wirtschaftlichste Fertigung auf Teil- oder Vollautomaten. Das gesamte Know-how steht auch für externe Aufträge zur Verfügung.
Die Basis aller Teile	Spanende Fertigung	Erstklassige Qualität und höchste Präzision der Fertigungsteile garantieren wir Ihnen mit unseren optimierten Fertigungsprozessen und modernen Maschinen.Mehr lesen
Feinste Präzision	Wasserstrahlschneiden	Wir verfügen über umfangreiche Erfahrungen im Wasserstrahlschneiden und setzen diese Technologie für die Einzel- und Serienfertigung ein.Mehr lesen
Individuelle Teile	Rapid Prototyping & 3D-Druck	In einem speziellen 3D-Verfahren auf ONYX Basis können wir in kürzester Zeit komplexe dreidimensionale Bauteile herstellen.Mehr lesen
Schaltschrankbau	Die zentrale Steuereinheit	Wir planen und fertigen sämtliche Schaltschränke für unsere entwickelten Maschinen und Anlagen selbst. Gerne übernehmen wir dies aber auch für externe Aufträge.
Alle Arbeiten werden von qualifizierten Elektrofachkräften ausgeführt.Mehr lesen
Qualitätsversprechen	Höchste Ansprüche an Mensch und Maschine
Inhouse Produktion	Alle Maschinen werden an unseren Firmenstandorten in Deutschland gefertigt. Wir entwickeln unser Maschinenprogramm stetig weiter, um kontinuierlich die neuesten Marktanforderungen zu erfüllen.
Volle Kontrolle	Wir entwickeln die Software für die Maschinensteuerungen, die in die gefertigten Schaltschränke eingesetzt wird, selbst. Im Zusammenspiel mit Komponenten renommierter Hersteller garantieren wir so höchsten Komfort und Ausfallsicherheit.
Zuverlässigkeit	Unsere Entwicklungen sind zuverlässig, schnell & präzise. Dank optimaler Arbeitsprozesse und Langlebigkeit der Komponenten, sind sie auch besonders wirtschaftlich.
Technische Beratung	Sie suchen nach einem Partner für Ihr Projekt?	Profitieren Sie von unserer Erfahrung und kontaktieren Sie uns.Projekt anfragen

Vision – Kamerasystem
Vision - Kamerasystem	Der sehende Roboter	Die Vision-Technologie wird für die Handhabung, Erkennung sowie für Kontrollzwecke eingesetzt. Der „sehende“ Roboter kann mit dieser Technologie Teile unterschiedlicher Geometrie oder Farbe erkennen und sicher aufnehmen.
Für Kontrollzwecke werden Einzelteile auf ordnungsgemäße Geometrie überprüft, bevor diese weiterverarbeitet werden. Weitere quantitative und qualitative Kontrollparameter sind:Überprüfung der Montagequalität Überprüfung auf Vollständigkeit und Einhaltung der Montagespezifikation Schnelle Unterscheidung von iO- und niO-Teilen in hoher Stückzahl

Projekte
Projekte	Intelligente und modulare Automatisierung	Die nachfolgend beschriebenen Projektbeispiele sollen Ihnen unsere Kernkompetenzen in den Bereichen Montage, Bearbeitung, Transport und Prüfung von Produkten näherbringen. Die Lauffähigkeiten unserer bestehenden Anlagen beweisen deren Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit. Präzise Handhabung, technologisch herausfordernde Bearbeitung und exakte Qualitätsprüfung sind Teil der Lösung.

Dichtigkeitsprüfung
Dichtigkeitsprüfung	Konstante Qualität	Die Qualitätsanforderungen an Ihre Produkte steigen stetig. Besonders im Bereich der Medizintechnik können Produktfehler fatale Folgen für Mensch und Gesundheit haben.
Neben der optischen Qualitätskontrolle sind Verfahren wie die Dichtigkeitsprüfung nach der Montage von Komponenten nicht mehr wegzudenken. Durch die Implementierung eines physikalischen Prüfprozesses in Ihrer Anlage werden Sie den hohen Anforderungen gerecht.
Vakuum & Drucktests	Angepasst an jede Anforderung	Als Ergänzung zu den Bildverarbeitungssystemen können montierte Komponenten mit einem Vakuum- oder Drucktest überprüft werden. Die hierfür erforderlichen Messgeräte werden nach Ihren Spezifikationen oder nach unserer Empfehlung eingesetzt. Die Komponenten werden vom Roboter in die dafür vorgesehene Kammer platziert, in welcher der Test durchgeführt wird.

ANFRAGEN / KONTAKT
Spanende Fertigung
Spanende Fertigung	Digitale Konstruktion kombiniert mit modernster 3D Technik	Konstruktion und Fertigung sind eng miteinander verbunden. Die zu bearbeitenden Geometriedaten aus der CAD-Konstruktion werden direkt in die Fertigungsanlagen übernommen. Unsere moderne Fertigungstechnologie ermöglicht die Bearbeitung komplexer 3D-Freiformfrästeile.
An unseren CAM unterstützten Arbeitsplätzen übernehmen wir die Konstruktionsdaten unterschiedlicher Formate direkt in die Fertigungsanlagen.
Material, Größe und Komplexität	Einzelteile oder Kleinserien in höchster Präzision	Unsere qualifizierten Mitarbeiter, optimierte Fertigungsprozesse und moderne Maschinen garantieren Ihnen die beste Qualität und höchste Präzision der Fertigungsteile.
Jedes Bauteil wird von unserer Qualitätssicherung mit modernster 3D-Messtechnik spezifikationsgerecht überprüft.
Alle internen Abteilungen Konstruktion & Entwicklung, mechanische Fertigung, Schaltschrankbau, Wasserstrahlschneiden und Rapid Prototyping stehen auch einzeln für externe Aufträge zur Verfügung.
Materialübersicht	Wir verarbeiten folgende Materialien in unserem multifunktionalen Maschinenpark:Aluminium Messing
Kupfer Stahl Neusilber rostfreie Stähle HGW und andere Kunststoffe
Abmessungen	Wir geben hier einen kleinen Einblick in unsere technischen Möglichkeiten:
Spanen und Fräsen
bis zu einer Abmessung von 1.100 x 480 mm
Drehen
Durchmesser von 3–60 mm in Spannzangen Durchmesser von 60–300 mm im Backenfutter
Universal-Drehmaschine	Wir zeigen hier einige Beispielwerte im Bereich der drehenden Fertigung:Max. Werkstücklänge bei Reitstock (bearbeitbar): 500 mm Max. Spannfutterdurchmesser: Ø 225 mm Max. Spindeldrehzahl: 6.000 U/min Max. Spannzangendurchmesser: Ø 65 mm Toleranz: < 10 µm im Durchmesser

Software & Visualisierung
Software & Visualisierung	Moderne Steuerelemente	Wir setzen Steuerungen aller namhaften Hersteller (z.B. Siemens, Beckhoff, Eaton oder Rockwell) je nach Kundenwunsch oder bester Eignung ein.
Die Programmierung der Steuerungen erfolgt durch unsere Software-Ingenieure in den bekannten SPS-Programmiersprachen sowie den gängigen Hochsprachen (Java, TwinCat 2 & 3, C, Siemens Tia Portal, etc.).
Sie profitieren von unserer Erfahrung in der Montage unter­schiedlichster Anwendungsfälle und von der hohen Flexibilität bei der Auswahl des passenden Software-Herstellers. So gewährleisten wir Ihnen höchste Prozesssicherheit.
Hauseigene Bedienoberfläche	HMI – Human Machine Interface	Besonderen Wert legen wir auf eine benutzerfreundliche Bedienerführung. Unsere hauseigenen HMI (Human Machine Interface) Technologien ermöglichen ansprechende Bedienoberflächen und entsprechen den aktuellen Ergonomie-Richtlinien laut VDMA (Verband Deutscher Maschinen- und Anlagenbau). Somit profitieren Sie bei Ihren Systemlösungen von höchstem Bedienkomfort.
Kontrollsysteme	Vision - Kamerasysteme	Bildverarbeitungssysteme werden unter anderem für Kontrollzwecke eingesetzt, um den Qualitätsansprüchen an das Produkt unserer Kunden und Partner gerecht zu werden. Hierbei werden die Bauteile auf ordnungsgemäße Farbe, Position oder Geometrie überprüft, bevor diese weiterverarbeitet werden.
Des Weiteren setzten wir Vision-Systeme zur Überprüfung der Montagequalität aber auch der Überprüfung auf Vollständigkeit und der Einhaltung der Montagespezifikation ein. Somit lassen sich optisch auch in hohen Stückzahlen und schnellen Taktzeiten iO-Teile von niO-Teilen unterscheiden und separieren.Mehr lesen
Robotik & Greifersysteme	Montage von flexiblen Bauteilen	Wir verwenden Roboter aller namhaften Hersteller und integrieren sowohl Single Robot Systems, als auch Dual Robot Systems in die Automatisierungslösungen oder einzeln als Modul. Die Auswahl der am besten geeigneten Systeme, erfolgt immer in direkter Absprache mit Ihnen als Partner.Mehr lesen

    "title": "Start - SMS Maschinenbau GmbH - EN",
    "bodyText": "Control technologyEngineeringGrinding technology\nSkip navigationDownloads\nContact\nLegal notice\nPrivacy policyDE\nEN\nSkip navigationStart\nCompanyAbout us\nValues\nHistoryApplications & solutionsExternal Thread grinding\nInternal Thread Grinding\nGroove / front rake grinding\nRelief Turning for Gear Cutting Tools\nMeasuring TechnologyServicesAftersales\nContract Production\nMeasuring Services\nControl System Conversion\nTestingCareersStudents\nTrainees\nYoung Professionals\nProfessionals\nWorking at SMSSuppliersSuppliers\nApply to be a supplierE-Mail\nDownloads\nLegal notice\nPrivacy policy\nLinkedIn\nDeutsch\nYOUR SPECIALIST FOR THE MANUFACTURE OF CNC PROFILE AND THREAD GRINDING MACHINESAs early as 1995, the founders of SMS Precision Machines GmbH recognised the far-reaching trend of control technology for machine tools. The company was one of the first to equip existing (mechanical) thread grinding machines with cutting-edge CNC technology at attractive prices. The basic machines – principally those manufactured by Reishauer and Klingelnberg – were reconditioned and modernised (CNC retrofit).\nFind out moreNewsCurrently there are no news items.EventsCurrently there are no events.APPLICATIONS & SOLUTIONS\nMALE THREAD GRINDING\nFEMALE THREAD GRINDING\nGroove / front rake grinding\nRELIEF TURNING FOR GEAR-CUTTING TOOLS\nMeasuring technology\nWHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY ABOUT US\n„Partners like SMS Precision Machines GmbH and their machines allow us to produce at a higher level than the market average. SMS Precision Machines GmbH is the market leader and our long-standing collaboration is a real win for us.“\nEmuge-Werk | Richard Glimpel GmbH & Co. KGGermany\n„The SMS thread grinder has a lot of modifications that weren’t commercially available on the standard machine. This enables us to produce our top-selling threading tool in a single operation, where it used to take three. The win for us is a saving of labour costs on manufacturing automotive taps.“\nSutton Tools Pty. DeutschMEASURING TECHNOLOGY
SMS Precision Machines GmbH is a specialist for the development and construction of state-of-the-art thread grinding machines. Our product portfolio ranges from highly flexible all-purpose thread grinding machines all the way to fully automated special-purpose thread grinding machines for use in mass production. Thread grinding with maximum precision, in keeping with today's requirements, is guaranteed by the use of SMS machines!FILTER BY WORKPIECE
Filter by workpieceSkip navigationThread-cutting / forming taps
Product info
CNC-RETROFITDo you have any questions?
We will be happy to help you!
SMS Precision Machines GmbHTel.: (+49) (0) 74 32 / 9 84 08-0Fax: (+49) (0) 74 32 / 9 84 08-21
Email: vertrieb@sms-gmbh.deSM50Thread-cutting / forming tapsMeasuring technology for threading tools: Made by SMS Precision Machines GmbH.
View Details
CNC-Retrofit CNC-ModernisationCNC-Overhaul
Retrofitting or modernising an existing machine is often a better alternative to investing in a new machine. This kind of modernisation allows you to make use of any base machine elements that are still in good condition (e.g. machine bed, various cast parts). Here, change-speed gears etc. are replaced with CNC drives, any existing dressing technology is usually replaced with flexible CNC dressing.
Modernisation is completed with a high-performance CNC control system with user-friendly dialogue programming and the option for state-of-the-art remote diagnostics.
These machines can also be equipped with an automatic loading system and/or specific profiling software and much more.
This could possibly be a more cost-effective alternative to a new machine.
We’d be happy to arrange a consultation if you would like to know more: contact us!TopSMS Precision Machines GmbH
Brunnenstraße 117 – 119  |  D-72461 AlbstadtTel.: (+49) (0) 74 32 / 9 84 08-0Fax: (+49) (0) 74 32 / 9 84 08-21

YOUR FLEXIBLE PARTNER FOR LONG-TERM SOLUTIONSInspection
We carry out a detailed inspection on the machine to identify any defects and damage. This inspection does not involve repair. It simply reveals the need for any potential servicing.
We then create a catalogue of measures (including quote) to help ensure continued productivity, quality and machine availability.
Maintenance
We inspect and, if necessary, readjust the machine’s geometry. Small parts such as scrapers, filters or seals are replaced here to prevent more expensive assemblies from malfunctioning.
Qualified experts perform an in-depth inspection of the machine to identify any potential damage or defects.
We then create a catalogue of measures (including quote) to help ensure continued productivity, quality and machine availability.
Qualification / Availability
Our experts regularly receive training. This, combined with our extensive range of genuine spare parts at our warehouse, ensures that your machines stay up and working.
Maintenance leafletCONTRACT PRODUCTION
A PARTNERSHIPWITH PERKS.
We have many years of experience in the area of grinding technology as the manufacturer of precision machines. But don’t just take our word for it, see for yourself. With our state-of-the-art CNC grinding machines, we produce the components you need with extreme precision and in impeccable quality.
We’re happy to provide contract production for threads, gear-cutting tools and drive components such as drive worms and spur gearing. You can also make use of our testing and demonstration machines for your orders upon request, whether it's for bridging any shortages in capacity or testing our machines under production conditions.
We also have a wide range of machinery for applications such as: eroding, flat/internal cylindrical/external cylindrical grinding and turning/milling for individual parts and small batches.
Whether it's series production or the manufacture of individual components – we’re happy to cater to your individual needs and implement these exactly.
THERE ARE VARIOUS REASONS TO CONTACT US AS A CONTRACT MANUFACTURER:Support in the coordination of all start-up activities in the process of creating your products
Reduction in investment cost through machine hire/leasing
Non-profitability for a special range of partsMEASURING SERVICES
IT’S ALL ABOUT PRECISION!
Our range includes the following measuring devices
Klingelnberg P40

SM50Flank relief measurement
Outer diameter relief measurement
Bevel relief measurementon thread-cutting tap and thread-forming tap and thread milling cutters
Laser measurementPosition precision machine tools with compensation (Status Pro)
Circular test (Heidenhain cross grid)
The KGM cross grid measurement device is suitable for actively testing the path characteristics of CNC-controlled machine tools, allowing for circular tests with radii from 0.1 mm to 115 mm at feed rates of up to 80 m/min.
We can also perform laser measurements and circular testing on site at your premises.We are also happy to provide a wide range of related services on request.

We can also perform laser measurements and circular testing on site at your premises.We are also happy to provide a wide range of related services on request.CONTROL SYSTEM CONVERSION
GIVE YOUR OLD SYSTEMSA NEW LEASE OF LIFE!
CONTROL SYSTEM CONVERSION FOR YOUR GRINDING MACHINES (RETROFIT):
Retrofit your grinding machines in line with the latest state of the art: Our control system modernisations for grinding machines are far more cost-effective than a new investment, especially for machines with mechanical components in good condition but a control system that is a little outdated. A control system conversion can significantly minimise unplanned downtime, reduce high maintenance costs and improve poor energy efficiency. Retrofitting your machines with the latest technology also helps you to improve production quality.
Benefits:Operational safety – by using the state-of-the-art control platform and replacing outdated components to modernise your control system, you can ensure your process continues to run with the highest level of reliability..
Guaranteed lifecycle service –once your control system is modernised, you have access to all our services, including spare parts, technical support and training, for your machine.
Improved maintainability – retrofitting your control system allows you make use of remote support options through the use of modern technology, improving fault logging for troubleshooting.
Longer service life – control system retrofits provide custom solutions tailored to the customer’s needs that have the minimum impact on your machine’s system environment.
read more
show less
GRINDING MACHINE CONTROL SYSTEMS (NEW MACHINES):
We develop programs for high-tech grinding machines. Our machines can be intelligently integrated into production processes with interfaces to both overarching IT systems and measuring machines. Developed by SMS, the HMI makes it easy to operate our grinding machines and allows users to configure the relevant programs in no time. Our mission is to automate our grinding machines in a way that constantly ensures the safety of the user, the machine and the environment. We offer productive solutions for integrating IT into our control systems on the path towards Industry 4.0. Commissioning and programming robots or other automation systems are common practice for SMS.TESTING
TRY SOMETHING OUT AND CHALLENGE US.
We are always able to provide expert support for your planning thanks to our extensive knowledge of grinding technology.
You have access to our testing and demonstration machines to carry out testing, as well as modern, high-performance test and measurement devices for determining the results of testing. Our powerful SM50 is perfect for testing threading tools while the Klingelnberg P40 is available for gear-cutting tools.TopSMS Precision Machines GmbH

YOUR SPECIALIST FOR THE MANUFACTURE OF CNC PROFILE AND THREAD GRINDING MACHINESAs early as 1995, the founders of SMS Precision Machines GmbH recognised the far-reaching trend of control technology for machine tools. The company was one of the first to equip existing (mechanical) profile and thread grinding machines with cutting-edge CNC technology at attractive prices. The basic machines – principally those manufactured by Reishauer and Klingelnberg – were reconditioned and modernised (CNC retrofit).MACHINES
In addition to our retrofit service in the form of electrical and/or mechanical inspections, a service on which the company was founded, today’s main focus lies in developing and manufacturing our own profile and thread grinding machines for various areas of use. SMS has accumulated extensive expertise and is always guided by the latest trends. All manufactured grinding machines – whether they’re new developments or retrofit solutions – meet the highest standards of accuracy, productivity and flexibility.EXTENSIVE RANGE
We are constantly working to expand on the applications and development of our machines. Programmed in the dialogue system (HMI), custom software solutions guarantee thread grinding to the highest standards for every task. The product spectrum of SMS ranges from highly flexible all-purpose thread grinding machines all the way to fully automated special-purpose thread grinding machines for use in mass production. In addition to our core business, CNC PROFILE AND THREAD GRINDING MACHINES, our product range also includes machines for measuring tip relief, profiling machines and relieving lathe machines.
Our HistoryOUR VALUES & OUR QUALITY POLICY
IT’S WHO WE ARE ... SMSCOMPETITIVENESS
We identify market opportunities early and develop highly innovative products as quickly as possible, which we then successfully market to new and existing customers. This allows us to secure our market position and generate profitable growth.CUSTOMER FOCUS
We use our resources flexibly in the aim of achieving the best results for our customers – it’s a win-win situation. Dedicated customer support and protection of our interests is crucial here.SUCCESSFUL COLLABORATION
When it comes to collaboration, we strive to ensure an honest, open working relationship based on a mutual trust and respect. We are loyal to SMS and work reliably and efficiently to complete the tasks assigned to us.TEAM SPIRIT
The joy of working as part of a successful team and enthusiasm for our products and services are important deeply rooted values at SMS.ENTREPRENEURIAL CONDUCT
We achieve the best overall results by taking responsibility and keeping an eye on costs with a comprehensive understanding of various sectors.QUALITY AWARENESS
We carry out our day-to-day activities in line with high quality standards and constantly strive to improve our products and all services.PERFORMANCE
We achieve our goals and we use the necessary and available means to do so.COMPANY HISTORY

YOUR FLEXIBLE PARTNER FOR LONG-TERM SOLUTIONSInspection
We carry out a detailed inspection on the machine to identify any defects and damage. This inspection does not involve repair. It simply reveals the need for any potential servicing.
We then create a catalogue of measures (including quote) to help ensure continued productivity, quality and machine availability.
Maintenance
We inspect and, if necessary, readjust the machine’s geometry. Small parts such as scrapers, filters or seals are replaced here to prevent more expensive assemblies from malfunctioning.
Qualified experts perform an in-depth inspection of the machine to identify any potential damage or defects.
We then create a catalogue of measures (including quote) to help ensure continued productivity, quality and machine availability.
Qualification / Availability
Our experts regularly receive training. This, combined with our extensive range of genuine spare parts at our warehouse, ensures that your machines stay up and working.
Maintenance leafletCONTRACT PRODUCTION
A PARTNERSHIPWITH PERKS.
We have many years of experience in the area of grinding technology as the manufacturer of precision machines. But don’t just take our word for it, see for yourself. With our state-of-the-art CNC grinding machines, we produce the components you need with extreme precision and in impeccable quality.
We’re happy to provide contract production for threads, gear-cutting tools and drive components such as drive worms and spur gearing. You can also make use of our testing and demonstration machines for your orders upon request, whether it's for bridging any shortages in capacity or testing our machines under production conditions.
We also have a wide range of machinery for applications such as: eroding, flat/internal cylindrical/external cylindrical grinding and turning/milling for individual parts and small batches.
Whether it's series production or the manufacture of individual components – we’re happy to cater to your individual needs and implement these exactly.
THERE ARE VARIOUS REASONS TO CONTACT US AS A CONTRACT MANUFACTURER:Support in the coordination of all start-up activities in the process of creating your products
Reduction in investment cost through machine hire/leasing
Non-profitability for a special range of partsMEASURING SERVICES

GIVE YOUR OLD SYSTEMSA NEW LEASE OF LIFE!
CONTROL SYSTEM CONVERSION FOR YOUR GRINDING MACHINES (RETROFIT):
Retrofit your grinding machines in line with the latest state of the art: Our control system modernisations for grinding machines are far more cost-effective than a new investment, especially for machines with mechanical components in good condition but a control system that is a little outdated. A control system conversion can significantly minimise unplanned downtime, reduce high maintenance costs and improve poor energy efficiency. Retrofitting your machines with the latest technology also helps you to improve production quality.
Benefits:Operational safety – by using the state-of-the-art control platform and replacing outdated components to modernise your control system, you can ensure your process continues to run with the highest level of reliability..
Guaranteed lifecycle service –once your control system is modernised, you have access to all our services, including spare parts, technical support and training, for your machine.
Improved maintainability – retrofitting your control system allows you make use of remote support options through the use of modern technology, improving fault logging for troubleshooting.
Longer service life – control system retrofits provide custom solutions tailored to the customer’s needs that have the minimum impact on your machine’s system environment.
read more
show less
GRINDING MACHINE CONTROL SYSTEMS (NEW MACHINES):
We develop programs for high-tech grinding machines. Our machines can be intelligently integrated into production processes with interfaces to both overarching IT systems and measuring machines. Developed by SMS, the HMI makes it easy to operate our grinding machines and allows users to configure the relevant programs in no time. Our mission is to automate our grinding machines in a way that constantly ensures the safety of the user, the machine and the environment. We offer productive solutions for integrating IT into our control systems on the path towards Industry 4.0. Commissioning and programming robots or other automation systems are common practice for SMS.TESTING
TRY SOMETHING OUT AND CHALLENGE US.
We are always able to provide expert support for your planning thanks to our extensive knowledge of grinding technology.
You have access to our testing and demonstration machines to carry out testing, as well as modern, high-performance test and measurement devices for determining the results of testing. Our powerful SM50 is perfect for testing threading tools while the Klingelnberg P40 is available for gear-cutting tools.TopSMS Precision Machines GmbH

Name: IMSTec GmbH
Description:
IMSTec is a family-run company in customized manufacturing. For more than 20 years, IMSTec has been developing and realizing high precision manufacturing processes and customer-specific automation solutions for medical technology, micro and precision engineering, as well as for the pharmaceutical industry, offering its customers complete solutions from a single source as a service partner. 

IMSTecMedical provides support in the development of an optimized manufacturing process and ensures maximum product quality. IMSTecMedical is currently establishing a quality standard in compliance with ISO 13485.

Industries
Precision EngineeringIndustries
Reliable and safe processes for precision engineeringPrecision in perfectionThe handling of sensitive and high-precision components is one of IMSTec's specialties. With years of experience and innovative solutions, we develop production processes to the highest standards.
From medical technology and optics to aerospace: precision engineering products combine precision, engineering skills and innovation. Our focus is on the development and automation of manufacturing processes. At IMSTec, we can apply coatings of less than 5 microns to micro parts. Using state-of-the-art image processing, every process step can be checked and documented.Handling of complex productsModular plant engineeringISO class 6 to 8 cleanroomsOwn development laboratoriesActive AlignmentPrecise alignment of componentsActive alignment, an innovative method for the precise adjustment of components in real time, is a decisive advance in precision engineering. This technology is used particularly frequently in the production of optical and electromechanical systems, such as camera modules, laser devices or sensors.In contrast to passive adjustment methods, Active Alignment enables active monitoring and adjustment during the production process. This achieves maximum precision and perfect positioning of the components. This leads to better performance, higher product quality and reduced rejects - decisive advantages in a highly competitive industry.
A solution for every product
The development and manufacture of mechanical and electromechanical components and systems requires precision and reliability.
METAL PARTSMETAL PARTSGeometry measurement and inspection, as well as classification
INJECTOR SPRINGSINJECTOR SPRINGSAutomatic system for separating and feeding the components, as well as measuring and evaluating the welded joint

Process developmentServices
Process development & project phase planningOptimized, tailor-made process solutions for individually oriented customer requirements are rare and hard to find on the market. If no solution can be found on the industry market, we develop the necessary process technology ourselves - often where others stop. The certification requirements of the FDA and GMP form the basis of our process developments. The manufacture of medical products - even under cleanroom conditions - is carried out in close cooperation with our customers. In this way, we enable successful implementation that is reduced by project risks.

Services
ValidationServices
Validation for your production processFor the development of the required process, we focus on close cooperation with our customers. In joint steps we develop, optimize and complete the manufacturing process through all validation phases, parallel to product development. In requirements for later series production, we supervise each individual process step in order to guarantee our customers a smooth, high-quality and ultimately certifiable production line.
Individual support
In collaboration with the customer, the critical processes are defined. On this basis, the scope of testing is determined and a validation tailored to the customer is offered.In-house cleanrooms
In addition to intensive support in workshops and meetings, our customers also find ideal conditions in our premises. Our own clean rooms are provided at our state-of-the-art production plant.Pre-qualification
To enable a smooth start of production, a pre-qualification can take place at our premises. Ideal test conditions are available in our modern laboratory.
Key to efficiency and safetyIn the world of mechanical engineering, technical documentation is not just a formal act, but an essential part of the entire product life cycle. It serves as an indispensable source of information for engineers, operators, users and maintenance personnel.Technical documentation comprises a large number of documents that provide information on the design, function, operation, service and maintenance of machines.Construction drawings and CAD models
Operating and maintenance manuals
CE declarations of conformity and risk assessments
Assembly instructions and spare parts listPrecise and clear to avoid misunderstandingsComply with legal requirements and standardsStructured and well maintained, for easy updatingCE-compliant in national language, especially for international marketsWhile the basics of technical documentation are universal, there are specific requirements in medical technology and precision engineering. These include the highest safety standards, comprehensive risk assessments and strict regulatory documentation in accordance with the MDR (Medical Device Regulation). Within precision engineering, there are particularly detailed specifications for precision components, which are often supplemented by detailed images in the µ range and exact dimension tables.At the beginning of the project kickoff, the client defines all requirements together with the project manager in a user requirements specification (URS). On this basis, IMSTec creates a functional specification (FS = Functional Specifications), which specifies the scope and implementation of the project. IMSTec acts according to the following guidelines:Medical Device Regulation (ISO 15378)
GMP-Guidelines (Good Manufacturing Practices)
Quality management standard (ISO 9001)
Full service for customersTechnical documentation is much more than a collection of instructions. It makes a decisive contribution to safety, efficiency and legal compliance. Particularly in specialized sectors such as medical technology, the pharmaceutical industry and precision engineering, detailed, precise and standard-compliant documentation is essential.Training for users and maintenance personnel
Customer-specific documentation solutions
Fast updates and digital access to technical documentationAs digitalization progresses, it is not only the formats and processes that are changing, but also the requirements for modern and digital documentation. For example, instructions and maintenance instructions can be accessed via electronic documentation platforms.Digital technical documentation is far more than just a replacement for paper documents. It offers new opportunities to increase efficiency and improve user-friendliness. However, regulatory requirements must always be complied with and sensitive data must be protected from unauthorized access.
How can we help you?Get in touch with us.
