Name: Emerson Corrosion and Erosion Monitoring
Description: Emerson offers the broadest range of corrosion and erosion monitoring technologies and services. The portfolio consists of class-leading non-intrusive monitoring techniques and a complete range of more traditional inline probes. We employ best in class wirelessHART data retrieval to deliver data directly to desk, enabling operational certainty in your facility/asset.

Name: Colchester Machine Tool Solutions
Description:
Colchester Machine Tool Solutions has been providing the engineering and manufacturing industry with high quality machine tools for over 100 years.

Colchester and Harrison centre lathes are utilised in many job shops worldwide and the Colchester Student, Master and Triumph / Harrison M300, V390 and V550 lathes are instantly recognised household names globally.

Our manual/CNC lathe ranges consist of the 2 or 3-axis Harrison Alpha XS and the Colchester MultiTurn models - fitted with Fanuc OiTF or Siemens 828D controls respectively.

The Colchester Tornado CNC turning centre range adds highly capable 2, 3 or multi-axis production machines and are built in either high speed linear or highly rigid box way configurations to suit any application.

Our Clausing machine tool range adds manual or CNC versions of mills, drills, grinders or saws to the overall Colchester Machine Tool Solutions portfolio.

Pratt Burnerd supplies a huge range of manual and power chucking solutions for standard and specialised applications. 

Our complete range of machine tools and accessories are frequently found in any industrial environment from general engineering, oil & gas, automotive and education & training establishments throughout the world.

Name: MTL Advanced Ltd
Description:
mtl advanced ltd is a well invested project manufacturing company partnered with WEC Group, specialising in the supply of components, ranging from precision cut parts to high integrity machined fabrications. 

We are a key supplier to various sectors including: defence, offshore, construction, quarrying and recycling. 

Our Rotherham manufacturing facility includes: laser cutting, high definition plasma cutting, waterjet cutting, CNC machining, gas profile cutting & fabrication with robotic, semi automated, & manual welding stations.

We work with many OEMs such as BAE Systems, Caterpillar & Sandvik.

Name: Heller Machine Tools Ltd (UK)
Description:
Heller Machine Tools Limited has been producing high quality CNC machines and delivering complex turnkey projects from its Midlands factory in Redditch to the Global market for over 50 years. Our facility currently employs 100 people. Our workforce is ideally balanced with a mixture of experience and youth.

Heller Machine Tools Ltd engage in a comprehensive apprenticeship program which provides us with the ideal vehicle for knowledge transfer, which in turn allows us to ensure the skills required to deliver our products are always at hand.

Our customer base is far reaching with customers in every continent and every country within them. The customers we serve operate in the most demanding of industry sectors, who demand high accuracy and high performance machines. These sectors include Aerospace, Automotive, Medical, Oil and Gas, Earth moving equipment, Mould and Die.

Our UK after market operation operates with a team of highly skilled service engineers supported by over £2 Million worth of spare parts stored at our UK facility, with spare parts also available from our German headquarters. This allows us to guarantee a 24 hour response to our customers. 

www.heller.biz/en/data-protection
www.heller.biz/en/imprint

Name: KASL Precision Machining
Description:
KASL Precision Machining are an established and highly respected bespoke Precision Engineering company based in the North East of the United Kingdom. Our business was established in 1997 and we are located across two manufacturing sites in Tyne & Wear; at Rainton Bridge Industrial Estate in Houghton-le-Spring and also at Parsons Industrial Estate in Washington.

KASL operate across a number of industry sectors including Oil & Gas, Renewable Energy, Subsea, Nuclear, Aerospace, Automotive, Power Generation, Medical and Defence. Our areas of expertise are:

- CNC Milling
- CNC Turning
- Sliding Head Machining
- Conventional Milling & Turning
- EDM Wire Erosion
- Specialist Threads
- Full 3D CAD/CAM
- ISO 9001:2105 Accredited Quality System
- Dedicated and Fully Equipped Inspection Department
- Full Design & Manufacture Capability

At KASL we strive to provide an exceptional service to all of our clients. We are part of the KASL Engineering Group, where we collaborate with our fellow group companies to deliver turn-key solutions to a wide range of clients in many industry sectors.

Name: Tridan Engineering Ltd - AS9100 & ISO14001 - Your Leading Contract Manufacturer
Description:
www.tridan.co.uk
Established in 1968, providing a total outsource partnership and machining service of high precision components to companies in the UK, Europe and USA, many of these leaders in their respective fields.

Approved to AS9100 & ISO14001. We provide major organisations in aerospace, defence, automotive, food, medical, marine and other industries with quality and reliable products utilising our extensive range of modern machinery.

Continuously investing in machine tools, including the very latest Sliding Head, Horizontal, 5 axis CNC machining centres and lathes. These are operated by a skilled workforce to provide standards of quality and service, which we believe, can only be matched by a few companies in the field.

Backed by an equally efficient modern inspection plant and procedures, covering the range from small components to large work pieces up to 1.66 meters in size, all of which can be produced in small or large batches or delivered from stock to Kan-Ban requirements. The Tridan service includes prototype parts, complete assemblies and all ancillary requirements such as heat treatment, plating processes and painting.

We have invested heavily in management and technical support software. A Windows based integrated networked Production Management System has been installed. This controls Sales Order Processing, Contract Control, through to Materials Management.

A Cad Cam system offers customers the opportunity to transmit drawing files in 2D or 3D solid formats such as DXF/IGES/DWG/CATIA and others. These are readily translated into machine codes and sent to our wireless DNC linked machine tools.

Name: Electro Mechanical Systems Ltd
Description:
EMS was founded in mid-1985 and quickly established itself as the leading supplier of high quality precision small DC motors and linear actuators. We are sole UK distributors for the FAULHABER Group as well as MPS and Piezomotor; manufacturers and suppliers of precision micro-drives, including DC motors; brushless motors; stepper motors; linear motors and associated gearheads and encoders. Complimentary products include iron-core DC motors from KAG, stepper motors and brushed DC motors from Nidec Servo and brushed and brushless gear motors from Nidec Motors & Actuators. In addition we distribute high quality linear actuators and telescopic columns from SKF and Mingardi, used extensively in medical; healthcare; agriculture; building automation and many other industries.

In 1990 we established our own manufacturing facility specialising in the design and manufacture of bespoke drive systems. Growth has been maintained with repeated expansion and capital investment to the point where we now have a modern 3,000m² facility. We have a large capacity machine shop equipped with the latest CNC machine tools and a dedicated gear cutting suite, as well as substantial assembly area. EMS offers design engineers a complete service; our scope of supply stretches from the supply of proprietary motors, gearheads, encoders and actuation systems, right the way through to added value in the way of pinions and wiring looms, to bespoke design and manufacture of complete drive systems to meet your exact applications needs.

Name: MRT Castings Ltd
Description:
MRT Castings manufacture high quality die castings in aluminium and zinc alloys, with extensive facilities for CNC machining and electro-mechanical assembly.  

We are a privately owned family business and have continually invested in the latest technology and training to ensure that we have one of the most highly skilled teams and the most advanced manufacturing facilities in the UK foundry industry.

Name: WELL MACHINED LTD
Description:
Well Machined management team has more than 80 years’ combined experience in precision machined products. We recognise that people are the business and continually challenge ourselves to become better.

Well Machined is privately owned, and the shareholders have continually re-invested profits into the growth and development of the company. Increasing capacity, capability and adopting latest technology to ensure that Well Machined meets the needs of its customers.

Our core business is CNC machining, we also offer assistance/advice in design to ease manufacture and reduce costs in materials.

Our services include: CNC turning, CNC Milling, Full turnkey application: material, machining, NDT, pressure test, coating, assembly.

All project managed to supply our customers with first class service and quality products.

The Well Machined team takes pride in providing a professional, quality service that exceeds Customer expectations and meets the requirements of National and International industry standards.

Name: Hydrafeed
Description:
Hydrafeed supply CNC Barfeeding equipment, robot automation equipment for all types of CNC turning and milling machinery and bespoke systems.

Hydrafeed also have a thriving sub-contract precision machining division, ISO 9001 approved, supplying the aerospace, packaging, measuring, test and automotive equipment.

Name: Mollart Cox Engineering Ltd
Description:
Precision Engineers, supplying precision machined components to the Oil & Gas, Nuclear, Defence, Hydraulic, Off Highway and Aerospace industries.
Specialising in Deep Hole Drilling, Gun Drilling, Honing, CNC Machining and 5 Axis Machining. With in house CAD CAM and full UKAS approved CNC CMM Mollart Cox can handle the most demanding precision components.

Name: Whitehouse Machine Tools
Description:
Delivering advanced CNC machine tools and automation solutions in the United Kingdom and Ireland for 40 years.

Our portfolio includes a broad range of high quality, highly productive products from specialist manufacturers throughout Asia and Europe, including: high speed twin pallet VMCs, 5-Axis Machining Centres, multi-axis Turning Centres, Expandable Horizontal Machining Centres and hard-turning lathes.

Name: FAST Technologies Ltd
Description:
FAST Technologies aims to be the preferred provider of turnkey custom manufacturing solutions to our clients. We focus on providing solutions in the following areas:

- Automation and Machine Design
- Robotics
- DC Systems
- Chemical Delivery & Wet Process
- Manufacturing & Software Solutions

FAST Technologies is a progressive innovative organisation, with ongoing rapid business growth.

Our client base includes some of the world’s most successful technology based companies and world leaders in manufacturing

Name: Optimal Industrial Automation
Description:
Optimal Industrial Automation has more than 30 years’ experience building, integrating and optimising manufacturing automation systems for challenging and highly regulated industries. Typically food & beverage, chemical, pharmaceutical, life-science and other high-value process and manufacturing industries.

The demands being placed on manufacturers in relation to production costs, product quality and business sustainability are ever increasing; hence, the company’s primary aim is to deliver measurable improvements in all these target areas.

Optimal employs a large technical team qualified in software, electrical, electronic, vision and control hardware disciplines. As part of the implementation of these services, Optimal has also developed a world-leading integrated Print and Inspect system product - synTI.

Read more about Optimal's Technologies business, too: https://www.linkedin.com/company/optimal-industrial-technologies/about/?viewAsMember=true

Name: Frazer-Nash Manufacturing Limited
Description:
We specialise in the manufacture of precision engineered components, parts and assemblies for customers in the most demanding sectors of industry, from scientific discovery to space exploration. 

We partner with each customer, bringing a unique combination of skills, experience and engineering know-how to every project – it’s a combination that ensures we deliver unrivalled value time after time. 

Since our foundation almost 100 years ago, the Frazer-Nash name has been synonymous with technical innovation, outstanding quality and exceptional customer service. 

Today, we bring together a century of knowledge with the most advanced manufacturing technologies to provide engineering services that will transform your next engineering project.

Capabilities include: 
•	Metal additive manufacturing
•	Large bed milling
•	5-axis milling
•	Large diameter turning
•	Grinding
•	Wire EDM
•	Toolmaking

Why not see how we can help you with your next project?  Call us today on +44 (0) 1730 230340 or email enquiries@frazernash.com.

Name: Ward Hi-Tech Limited
Description: We are a large CNC machine tool distributor covering the UK and Ireland offering a wide ranging and diverse portfolio of CNC machines to all major market sectors. With such well-known brands as Dah Lih, HNK, Hwacheon, Kiheung, SFM & Vision Wide you can be assured of top quality solutions when you deal with Ward Hi Tech. We always carry large volumes of stock from 8” lathes right up to large horizontal machining centres and vertical borers, so it’s a must to call us to find out what’s in stock or what’s on its way to us. But it’s not just great machine tools that we offer; we can supply a total turnkey solution including: installation, training, tooling, fixturing, CADCAM solutions, full robotic automation systems and flexible tailored funding packages making us the perfect one stop shop for all your machine tool requirements.

Name: 5 AXIS LTD
Description:
5 AXIS LTD 

A full turn-key precision engineering company meeting all machining requirements in every industry.

We have 10x '5 AXIS CNC' machines & 4x '3 AXIS CNC machines' including our newest addition 5 AXIS CNC machine with a - 5.2 meter 2.5 meter machining bed 

5 Axis Ltd completes the entire manufacture process in house. This enables us to have total control of the progress, cost and quality.


sales@5axisltd.com

Name: Burcas Limited
Description: For over 70 years Burcas has been at the leading edge of technology and quality, providing innovative machining solutions to the aerospace, defence, nuclear,and precision engineering markets. Specialising in high complex critical machined components Burcas is fully equipped with CNC milling, CNC turning and importantly CNC grinding including 5 axis capabilities for milling and grinding. This capability supports repeater, runner and speed shop customer orders and contracts in accordance with our future strategy. Based in Birmingham in a 35,000 sq. ft. facility our robust infrastructure and 50 strong team is ideally situated to support customers locally and internationally.

Name: CNC Data
Description:
We know CNC Machines and the data they produce inside out.

If making your manufacturing capabilities more efficient will increase overall revenue, then you’re exactly the type of company we can really help.

Name: ABBEY PRECISION LIMITED
Description: ABBEY PRECISION LIMITED is a precision engineering company specialising in the manufacture of components in metal and polymers. With 34 CNC machine tools and a workforce of over 50 skilled employees, we are one of the largest CNC machine shops in the area.

Name: Boxford
Description:
Boxford has been supplying precision 3D CAD/CAM and CNC machinery for schools, colleges, universities, engineering training centres and a variety of industrial customers all over the world for more than 70 years, and we’re proud that our experience and knowledge is helping some of the brightest young minds become the innovators and engineers of the future.

Our unrivaled knowledge in manufacturing 3D machines for education and prototypers helps good ideas become reality at the touch of a button. Our machines give students an invaluable understanding of the manufacturing process, which sets them up superbly for when they eventually move into the work place.

Name: Milltech Precision Engineering
Description:
Established in 1993, Milltech is a specialist precision subcontract CNC machining business with sub and full assembly facilities supporting a wide range of manufacturing industries such as aerospace, automobile, offshore oil and medical. 

We operate over 30 vertical and horizontal 3, 4 and full 5-axis machining centres and some 18 CNC turning centres including live tooling, twin-spindle and sliding-head technology machines. As part of our partnership strategy we can provide a full fabrication service, sourcing certified welding and sheet metalwork through our partners to enable us to be a 'one stop shop' for our customers.

Our aim is to develop long-term working partnerships with all our customers, with on-time delivery, high quality and proactive cost reduction programmes being the guiding principles.

Call Milltech on 01603 721337 or email sales@milltechgroup.co.uk today to find out how we can fulfil your CNC needs. 

Why not follow us on Twitter?
https://t.co/WFWKyA8Bey?amp=1

Name: NTG Precision Engineers
Description:
At NTG, we set the standard for precision engineering.

Based in Gateshead, UK, NTG is the engineering partner of choice for industry-leading companies who demand precision, reliability, and uncompromising quality. 

We work at the forefront of modern manufacturing and from our state-of-the-art facility, we deliver components that are not just engineered to perform - but built to last.

We specialise in high-precision machining, CNC milling, turning, EDM wire erosion, and complex component manufacturing, delivering tailored solutions across defence, nuclear, renewables, subsea, and oil & gas sectors.

Established in 1979 as Newcastle Tool and Gauge Ltd, NTG is embedded into the UK’s engineering and manufacturing landscape, and we are proud to bring British engineering expertise to some of the world’s biggest organisations. 

NTG has ISO 9001, ISO 14001 and First Point Assessment (FPAL) accreditations and in addition, we are one of only 10 UK businesses to be given World Class status by the GTMA. 

We are also JOSCAR registered and a member of Make UK Defence, Make UK and the North East Automotive Alliance.

Our key services include:
5-Axis Machining
CNC Milling
CNC Turning
EDM Wire & Spark Erosion
Surface & Cylindrical Grinding
Conventional Milling & Turning
CMM Inspection
Welding
Surface Treatments
Heat Treatment
Materials Testing

We are part of The NTG Group of precision engineering companies, which also includes ABS Precision. Through the synergy of NTG’s cutting-edge capabilities and ABS Precision’s specialist expertise, the group drives excellence in every project it undertakes. Our dedication to quality, sustainability, and collaboration ensures that we meet and exceed the expectations of industries that shape the world.

Name: Kenard Engineering Group
Description:
The Kenard Engineering Group is a sub-contract precision manufacturing organisation operating two manufacturing sites in Tewkesbury and Dartford. The company supplies precision components to customers' designs and specifications, with specific competency in the high quality, high complexity market sectors, including Aerospace, Defence, Oil & Gas, and Communications.

Our services include complex CNC machining and project management of assemblies, encompassing a wide range of disciplines such as non-destructive testing, heat treatment, chemical processing, painting and assembly. A forward thinking management team, highly skilled workforce and bespoke manufacturing IT system, has helped Kenard develop a streamlined, optimised production process that adds value at each step. All activity is underpinned by a quality policy that ensures all aspects of the manufacturing process, including materials and treatments, meet your exact requirements.
